Pus ju quitʼin ictalakaspʼitlh ni va xaclaktsʼimputun tichi chavaich ju xaquixakʼalai. Chai acsni ictalakaspʼitlh pus iclaktsʼilh lakatujun ixputayan cantila ju si oro ixtajunita.

Chai laʼixlacaitat junta ixlacya ixputayan cantila ixya pumatam ju va ixtʼachunch ixjunita tachi ju yuchi ju malakachachilh ju Dios ni lapanac catsucuyaʼ ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. Chai ju yuchi ixlakchʼita ju lhman ixpumpuʼ ju ixʼakxtakmanikʼota ju ixchʼajaʼ. Chai vachuʼ ixtanquilhakchʼimucʼacanta ju liston ju oro ixjunita.
Chai ju ixʼai slivasalh na xnapapa ixjunita. Chun tachi ju tuʼuʼ apamat borrego ju na xnapapa junita u tachi ju tuʼuʼ miqui. Chai kʼai lam lam ixtalakpuyajui tachi ju tuʼuʼ xaʼalapnaʼ jipi.

Chai ju ixchʼajaʼ lana kʼox slamnicʼa ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼoxi tsasnat ju va ancaʼ camaxtucalh lacajipi. Chai ju laʼixchivinti lana istasui ni na alin ju ixtachaput. Chunch tachi ju ixkʼasmatca istʼasat ju tuʼuʼ talhavanti xcan.

Chai ixchʼapata laʼixlhicana lakatujun stʼacu. Chai ju laʼixquilhni ixtaxtui lakatam espada ju na lhman ixjunita chai acxputʼui ixquicxtui. Chai ju ixʼucxpuʼ na slamnicʼa ixjunita tachi ju avilhchan acsni na pʼas maktaji.

Chai ju quitʼin acsni iclaktsʼilh pus lana tin ictaʼaktalh. Chai tachi ju va xanin ictama laʼixchʼajaʼ acsni ictaʼaktalh. Pus ju yuchi quimokslanilh ixmacaʼ laʼixlhicana laquilacatuna chai chani quijuni: ―Jantu atʼalhan. Quitʼin ju xactʼajun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai actsucukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch.
Chai ictʼajun ju chavai. Chai mas xacnita para ictʼajun chai actsucukʼalhiyaʼ. Chai quitʼin ju icnajun tichi chavaich ju caniyaʼ chai quitʼin ju icchʼapata ju xallave junta taʼan ju tanita.
Pus atsʼokʼulatʼich ju tuchʼi xalaktsʼin chai ta yu junita ju aliʼ taxtokni ju chavai chai ju tuchi catapasayaʼ astan.

Pus chanich ju nomputun ju anuʼ ju jantu lai xamachʼakxai ixlacata ju anuʼ lakatujun stʼacu ju laktsʼintʼa laquilhicana chai ju anuʼ lakatujun ixputayan cantila ju si oro ixtajunita. Pus ju anuʼ lakatujun stʼacu pulaktsʼipaxcavacan ju talhistʼacʼa ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakatujun lakʼachakʼanixni. Chai ju ixputayan cantila ju laktsʼintʼa pulaktsʼipaxcavacan ju quilhmaktujun ju quintalhilaksi.

Ju xaqʼuitʼachivinin vachuʼ chani ju quijuni: ―Chanich atsʼoknunin ju alhistʼacʼa ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakʼachakʼan Efeso: “Ma chanich tajunan ju yuchi ju chʼapata ju lakatujun stʼacu laʼixlhicana chai ju alhtanatʼajun laʼixlacaitat junta lacya ju lakatujun ixputayan cantila ju si oro tajunita.

Ma cʼatsai ju yuchi tuchʼi naviyatʼit. Ma cʼatsai ta yu chʼalhcʼatnanatʼit ju ixlacata chai ni chʼixkʼoyatʼit ju macxcai. Chai ma cʼatsai ni lana jantu laktsʼimpʼutʼunatʼit ju na kʼai tajunita. Chai ma alaktsʼintʼanutʼatʼit ju tanajunch ni ixtamalakachan tajunita mas jantu chai alhitʼaʼutʼatʼit ni va aʼokxchokʼonin.
Chai ma cʼatsai ni chʼixkʼoyatʼit va tuchi makʼalhkʼajnat. Chai ma chʼalhcʼatnanatʼit ju ixlacata. Chai ma jantu tavanan xkʼopʼatʼit.
Para ma alin ju tuchi jantu kʼox tapulhiulayan. Ma yuchi ni jantuch vana amapʼainininatʼit tachi ju ixlayatʼit ju pʼulhnan.

Pus ma apʼastʼactʼit ta yu ixlayatʼit ju makʼanchich acsni na ixmapʼainiyatʼit ju yuchi. Chai ma tamch apʼastʼactʼit. Chai ma chunchach ju alachʼokʼotʼit tachi ju ixlayatʼit acsni ixlhilacʼapʼintʼatʼitcaʼ ju yuchi. Chai ni jantu tamch apʼastʼacʼaʼitʼit pus ma va tam pantsʼiquis catalakminan ju yuchi chai ma catamakʼosuniyan ju ixputayan ju mincantilaʼan.

Para ju tuchʼi naviyatʼit ma alin lacatsʼunin ju kʼachani ju yuchi. Ma yuchi ni lana jantu kʼox lhiulayatʼit tuchi tanavi ju nicolaítanin. Chai ju yuchi ma vachuʼ jantu kʼox lhiulai tuchi tanavi ju yuʼunch.

Pus ju alin ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Pus ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma caxtaknicanaʼ ju xatocʼat ju qʼuiu ju xtʼakʼa ju atsucunti ju conkʼalhiyanta ju lactʼiyan junta vilhcha ju Dios. Ma yuchi ju caxtakniyaʼ ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti”. Chunch ju quijuni ni acʼajunilh ju amachakʼan Efeso.

Chai ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti vachuʼ chani quijuni: “Chani atsʼoknunin ju anuʼ ju alhistʼacʼa ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakʼachakʼan Esmirna. Ma chani tajunan ju ixtʼajun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai catsucukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch. Yuchi ju ixnita para lokʼonchokolh.

Ju yuchi ma cʼatsakʼojui tuchʼi naviyatʼit chai tuchʼi lhimakʼalhkʼajnanatʼit. Chai ma cʼatsai ni nonatʼit ni na quilhpatinin untʼatʼit mas jantu vasalh quilhpatinin untʼatʼit. Alai ma na makʼalinin untʼatʼit. Chai ju yuchi ma cʼatsai tuchi macxcai chivinti tajunan ju talhitapakaʼuchokoi isʼakstuʼan ni israelitanin mas jantu vasalh israelitanin tajunita. Alai ma va Satanás ju tachʼakʼokʼai.

Pus ma jantu atʼalhonitʼit ju alhimakʼalhkʼajnanaʼitʼit. Pus ju lhacaticuru ma caʼamapastʼacʼaniyaʼ ju lapanacni ni catalhinonaʼ ixtʼalhnuca ju aliʼin lamilhiʼuxijnan. Chai ni jantu acʼapʼaʼitʼit ju yuchi mas chunch cataʼulhtuyan pus ma catasuyaʼ ni vasalh lhilacʼapʼinatʼit ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Chai ma tachi lakacau avilhchan ju amamakʼalhkʼajnicʼanaʼitʼit. Para va tachi alhilaksitʼit ju yuchi mas amaknicʼanaʼitʼit chai ju yuchi ma cataxtakniyan ju mintalhajaʼan. Ma yuchi ni caʼalinaʼ ju miʼatsucuntiʼan jonkʼalhita lactʼiyan.

Pus ju alin ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Pus ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma jantu catinilh ju ixlaktʼui”. Chunch ju quijuni ni acʼajunilh ju amachakʼan Esmirna.

Chai ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti vachuʼ chani quijuni: “Atsʼoknunin ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakʼachakʼan Pérgamo. Ma chani tajunan ju quilhtaxtuta lakatam espada ju acxputʼui quicxtui.

Ma cʼatsakʼojui tuchʼi ju naviyatʼit. Chai ma cʼatsai ni anchach ju tʼonatʼit junta lhinajun ju Satanás. Chai ma cʼatsai ni mas anch ju tʼonatʼit para va tachi lhilaksiyatʼit ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui. Chai ma jantu tavanan nontʼatʼit ni jantu mispʼayatʼit ju yuchi mas acsni maknicalh lamilhiʼuxijnan ju Antipas ju vasalh ixlapanac ixjunita. Ma anchach ju maknicalh junta lhinajun ju Satanás.

Para ma alin lacatsʼunin ju naviyatʼit ju jantu kʼox lhiulai ju yuchi. Pus ma alin ju lamilhiʼuxijnan ju talacaʼini ju ixlhamapʼaksin ju makʼaniya lapanac ju Balaam ixjuncan. Yuchach ju junilh ju kʼai ucxtin Balac ta yu laich caʼapumakʼalhkʼosuyach ju israelitanin. Ju Balaam va ajunilh ni laich cataʼulh ju lhivai ju ixlhakʼailaktsʼincanta ju santo chai ni laich catatʼatsuculh va tichi chavaich.
Pus ma vana va chunch tanavi ju aliʼin ju lamilhiʼuxijnan. Chai vachuʼ ma va talacaʼini ju ixlhamapʼaksinʼan ju nicolaítanin. Chai lana jantu kʼox lhiulai ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui.
Pus ma tamch apʼastʼactʼit. U ni jantu pus ma vatsʼalhti catalakminan ju uxijnan ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti chai ma catatʼalasayan. Ma capulasayaʼ ju espada ju taxtui laʼixquilhni.

Pus ju alin ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Pus ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma caxtaknicanach ju vaiti ju makʼanicantacha ju lactʼiyan. Ma yuchi ju caxtakniyaʼ ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Chai ma vachuʼ caxtakniyaʼ lakatam xnapapa chiux junta tsʼokcanta ju sastʼi ixtapakaʼut. Chai ju anuʼ tapakaʼut ma jantu xamatiʼ mispai. Va yuchi ju caʼamaklhtayananach”. Chunch ju quijuni ni acʼajunilh ju amachakʼan Pérgamo.

Chai ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti vachuʼ chani quijuni: “Chani atsʼoknunin ju alhistʼacʼa ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakʼachakʼan Tiatira. Ma chani tajunan ju istsʼalh Dios ju kʼai lam lam talakpuyajui tachi ju tuʼuʼ xaʼalapnaʼ jipi. Chai ju ixchʼajaʼ ma lana kʼox slamnicʼa junita tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼoxi tsasnat ju va ancaʼ camaxtucalh lacajipi.

Pus ju yuchi ma cʼatsai tuchʼi naviyatʼit. Chai ma cʼatsai ni na amapʼainininatʼit chai vasalh lhilaksiyatʼit ju yuchi. Chai chʼalhcʼatnaniyatʼit chai chʼixkʼoyatʼit tachi chun ju macxcai. Chai ma vachuʼ cʼatsai ni palai lhu ju chʼalhcʼatnaniyatʼit ju chavai. Ma palai jantu acsni pʼulhnan xalhilacʼapʼinatʼit.

Para ma alin lacatsʼunin ju jantu kʼox lhiulai ju yuchi. Ma yuchi ni va yauch unitʼit ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju Jezabel juncan ni laich catavi lamilhiʼuxijnan. Chai ju yuchi va tajunan ni laich najun ixchivinti Dios mas jantu. Chai ju yuchi amalani chai aʼokxchokʼoi ju ixlapanacni ju anuʼ ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Ma va ajuni ni laich catatʼatsuculh va tichi chavaich chai ma lai cataʼulh ju lhivai ju ixlhakʼailaktsʼincanta santo.
Pus ma na lakalhu avilhchan ju xapacxan ni camacaulich ju alactuʼunti ju navi ni va tʼatʼajun va tichi chavaich. Para ma lana jantu tam pastacputun.

Pus ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti ma caxtakniyaʼ ju Jezabel ju na macxcai ixtakʼankʼat. Chai tachi chun ju talanita ju chunch atsucunti laʼixmacni yuchi ma caʼaxtakniyaʼ ju kʼai ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan vachuʼ. Ma chunch ju canaviyaʼ ni jantu catamaconaʼ ju tuchi tanavich.

Chai tachi chun ju isʼaskʼatʼan ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ma lana caʼamakniyach. Pus ju chunch tachi chun ju talhilaksi ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti ma catacʼatsayach ni ma yuchach ju alaktsʼintanuni ju tuchi takʼachani ju lapanacni chai tuchi tapastʼacʼa. Chai ma yuchach ju cataxtakniyan ju pumatamin milhiʼuxijnan tachi ju lhijunch ixlacata ju tuchi xanavi ju kʼantam kʼantam.

Pus ju yuchi ma taxakʼalayan ju uxijnan ju amachakʼan Tiatira ju jantu lacʼaʼinitʼatʼit ju ixlhamapʼaksin ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju Jezabel juncan. Jantu ixlanipʼutʼunatʼit mas ixtajunan ni yuchach ju palai kʼox tucan lhamapʼaksin mas va ixʼanuch ju Satanás. Pus uxijnan ju ma taxakʼalayan. Ma jantu tuʼuʼ atumpa tsʼinqʼui lhamapʼaksin ju cataxtakniyan.
Ma va yuchi ni atʼailhipʼitʼit tachi ju layatʼit tus acsni caminchokoyaʼ ju yuchi.
Pus ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai chai ju camuctaxtuyaʼ tachi ju najunta ju yuchi pus ma caxtakniyaʼ ju ixtachaput ni laich calhijonkʼoyaʼ ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.

Ju ixpai ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti xtaknita ju ixtachaput. Chai ju yuchi ma caxtakniyaʼ vachuʼ ixtachaput ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai. Chai ju yuchi ma calhinonaʼ. Para ju lapanacni ju jantu talacaʼini ma chunch ju caʼaʼulhtuyaʼ tachi acsni lhinekcan ju tuʼuʼ xalu.
Chai ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma vachuʼ caxtaknicanaʼ ju kʼai stʼacu ju xajachilh vatsʼisin.

Pus ju alin ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti”. Pus chunch ju quijuni ni acʼajunilh ju amachakʼan Tiatira.

Chai ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti vachuʼ chani quijuni: “Chani atsʼoknunin ju anuʼ ju alhistʼacʼa ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakʼachakʼan Sardis. Ma chani tajunan ju anuʼ ju malakachai ju Spiritu Santu chai ju chʼapata ju lakatujun stʼacu. Pus ju yuchi ma cʼatsai tuchʼi naviyatʼit. Chai mas noncanch ni lhilaksiyatʼit ju Dios para jantu slivasalh. Alai tachi ju va nitʼatʼit.

Pus ma alacpʼucʼuchʼokʼotʼitch. Chai ma alaʼaktʼaiʼutʼitch ni tachapun aʼunchʼokʼoyaʼitʼit. Chai ju chunch ma jantu acʼapkʼalhiyaʼitʼit ju Dios. Ma chunch ju alatʼit ni laktsʼinta ju tuchʼi naviyatʼit ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Chai ma najun ni jantu soknicʼa lhiulai ju Dios tachi ju naviyatʼit.

Pus ma apʼastʼactʼit ta yu xapʼuʼamaklhtʼayananatʼit ixchivinti Dios chai ni lhikʼach ju xakʼasmatʼatʼit. Pus ma alacʼaʼikʼalhitʼit. Chai ma tamch apʼastʼactʼit ixlacata tuchʼi naviyatʼit. Chai ni jantu alacpʼucʼuʼaʼitʼit pus ma catalakminan ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Ma tachi tam akʼalhonaʼ ju catalakminan chai ma lana jantu acʼatsʼayaʼitʼit tavanan ju lai camilh.

Para ma alin lacatsʼunin ju milhiʼuxijnan ju vilatʼit lakʼachakʼan Sardis ju jantu talhimalhquiliquita ixpumpuʼan ju tuchʼi naviyatʼit ju uxijnan. Chai ju yuʼunch ma catatʼaʼalhtananaʼ lactʼiyan ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Ma na xnapapa cajunaʼ ju ixpumpuʼan. Chai ma lhijunch ni chunch caʼamalakchʼinincalh.

Pus ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma camalakchʼinincanaʼ ju xnapapa pumpuʼ. Chai ma jantu catixacacalh ju ixtapakaʼut lacaʼalhiqui junta tsʼokcanta ixtapakaʼutʼan tachi chun ju alin isʼatsucuntiʼan jonkʼalhita. Chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan ju ixʼanquilhnin canoncanaʼ ni talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui.

Pus ju alin ju ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti”. Pus chunch ju quijuni ni acʼajunilh ju amachakʼan Sardis.

Chai ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti vachuʼ chani quijuni: “Chani atsʼoknunin ju anuʼ ju alhistʼacʼa ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakʼachakʼan Filadelfia. Ma chani tajunan ju yuchi ju na salaka junita chai ju va tachi najun ju istavasalanti. Yuchi ju chʼapata ju llave ju ixtaknita ju Dios ju kʼai ucxtin David. Chai ju yuchi ju chʼapata ju anuʼ llave acsni malhtekʼai tuʼuʼ malhtich pus ma jantu lai xamatiʼ malacchauchokoi. Chai acsni malacchajui tuʼuʼ malhtich ju yuchi pus ma jantu lai xamatiʼ malhtekʼai.

Pus ju yuchi ma cʼatsai tuchʼi naviyatʼit. Pus ma tamalhtekʼanitan ju malhtich junta lai chʼalhcʼatnanatʼit chai ma jantu lai xamatiʼ catamalacchoniyan. Chai ma cʼatsai ju yuchi ni tachapun untʼatʼit lacatsʼunin. Chai mas va chunch untʼatʼit para lacʼaʼitʼatʼit ju ixchivinti chai jantu tavanan nontʼatʼit ni jantu ixlapanacni untʼatʼit.

Pus ma alin ju talakʼayai ju Satanás chai tanajun ni israelitanin tajunita mas jantu. Va tanajun taʼaklhtamat chivinti. Pus ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti ma catamalakachanitachan ju yuʼunch chai ma catataquilhputaniyan ju uxijnan. Chai ma catanonaʼ ni na tamapainiyan ju Dios.

Pus ni ma xalacʼaʼiyatʼit ju ixchivinti ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti chai xachʼixkʼoyatʼit ju macxcai pus ju yuchi ma vachuʼ catalhistʼacʼan acsni caʼalinaʼ ju makʼalhkʼajnat ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Ma yuchi calhiʼalinaʼ ju makʼalhkʼajnat ni ma calaktsʼintanucanach ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ.

Pus ma jantu makʼan cajunaʼ tus caminchokoyaʼ ju yuchi. Pus ma alacʼaʼikʼalhitʼit tuchʼi xtʼaknicʼantʼatʼit. Ju chunch ma lai amakʼalhtʼayananaʼitʼit ju mintalhajaʼan miʼakstuʼan. Jantu va akʼantam caxtaknicalh.

Pus ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma tachi ju tuʼuʼ xatantun ixpujitat Dios canavicanaʼ. Ma lana jantu tavanan catitaxtulh ju anch. Chai ma calhimichicanaʼ laʼixkʼaimacan ixtapakaʼut ju Dios chai ixtapakaʼut ju ixlakʼachakʼan ju Dios. Ma yuchi ju sastʼi lakʼachakʼan Jerusalén ju caminanta ju lactʼiyan junta vilhcha ju Dios. Chai vachuʼ ma catsʼokʼulaniyach ju sastʼi ixtapakaʼut ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti.

Pus ju alin ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti”. Pus chunch ju quijuni ni acʼajunilh ju amachakʼan Filadelfia.

Chai ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui vachuʼ chani quijuni: “Chani atsʼoknunin ju anuʼ ju alhistʼacʼa ju quintalhilaksi ju tavilanancha ju lakʼachakʼan Laodicea. Ma chanich najun ju stavasalanti najun. Ma yuchi ju lai lhilaksican chai yuchi ju navikʼolh tachi chun ju taxtokni ju ixnajunta ju Dios ni caʼalilh.

Ju yuchi ma cʼatsai tuchʼi naviyatʼit. Pus ju uxijnan ma jantu ixlhichux ju miʼalhunutʼan ju lhilacʼapʼimpʼutʼunatʼit ju yuchi. Nin yuchi ni ma amacʼompʼutʼutʼit ju macxcai. Pus ma palai kʼox caʼixva ni lana ixlhilacʼapʼitʼit ixlhichux miʼalhunutʼan. U lana asamakʼantʼit.
Para ju uxijnan ni jantu ixlhichux miʼalhunutʼan ju lhilacʼapʼimpʼutʼunatʼit pus ju yuchi ma vachuʼ catasamakʼananch.

Pus ju uxijnan ma nonatʼit ni na makʼalinin untʼatʼit. Ma nonatʼit ni na lhu ju makʼaixtʼoktʼatʼit ju mimakʼalitʼan. Chai ma va nonatʼit ni jantu tuʼuʼ maktasqʼuiniyatʼit. Ma chunch ju nonatʼit para ma jantu machʼakxayatʼit ni Dios talaktsʼinan tachi ju lana na makʼalhkʼajnanatʼit chai painiʼitnich untʼatʼit chai quilhpatinin untʼatʼit chai alakʼachʼixnin untʼatʼit chai lana matich ju mimpumpuʼan.

Para ju yuchi ma taquilhtapujuyan ni atʼamonin ju yuchi ju oro ju lakʼoxicanta lacajipi. Ju chunch ma vasalh makʼalinin aʼunaʼitʼit. Chai ma atʼamonin ju xnapapa pumpuʼ ni laich alakchʼiyaʼitʼit. Chai ju chunch jantu amaxananaʼitʼit va ixlacaʼatalh ni va kʼai tsasau aʼunaʼitʼit. Chai ma atʼamonin ju cʼuchʼu ju laich amucʼayaʼitʼit lamilakchulhʼan ni laich vasalh alacʼavananaʼitʼit.

Pus ju yuchi acsni vasalh mapaini tam xamatiʼ pus ma kʼaji acsni jantu sok an chai mamakʼalhkʼajni. Pus ma yuchi talhijunan ni ixlhichux ju miʼalhunutʼan tamch apʼastʼactʼit ixlacata tuchʼi naviyatʼit.

Pus ju yuchi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui ma ya lacamalhtich lhimakspaʼ chai xakʼalai ju tanun pulacni. Chai ni xamatiʼ cakʼasmatniyaʼ ju ixchivinti chai camalhtekʼanilh pus ju yuchi ma catanuyaʼ chai ma catʼavenach.

Pus va tichi chavaich ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai ma calakʼaʼicanaʼ ni catʼatolaʼ laʼixpuʼucxtin ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti tachi ju yuchi ni sastuclh ju macxcai chai tʼavi ju ixpai ju laʼixpuʼucxtin.
Pus ju alin ju ixpakʼasmatni ma chach kʼasmatlh ju tuchi najun ju Spiritu Santu. Tuchi ajuni ju talhilaksi ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti”.

Acsni quintʼachivinkʼolh ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani alhiqui pus astan iclaktsʼilh ni ilhtekʼai lakatam malhtich ju lactʼiyan. Chai ickʼasmatnichokolh ixchivinti ju xaquimaʼatsʼokni ju ani chivinti. Chai ju iskʼasmatca ju anuʼ chivinti chunch ixjunita tachi ju istʼasat ju tuʼuʼ skʼolh. Chai chani quijuni: ―Asokʼoch ani chai acmasuniyan ju tuchi vasalh catapasayaʼ astan. ―Chunch ju xaquijuni.
Pus icʼalh chai ju Spiritu Santu tachapun xaquinavi ni lai xaclaktsʼin ju lactʼiyan ixputolan ju kʼai ucxtin. Chai anch ixvi ju Dios.

Chai ju yuchi chun slamnicʼa istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju jaspe juncan. Chai vachuʼ slapulh istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju sardis juncan. Vachuʼ ixtalakachoko ju putolan istasui lakatam quilhmacchat. Chai ju yuchi stakʼau istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju esmeralda juncan.

Chai ixtalakachoko ju anuʼ xakʼai putolan ixʼalin alakapʼuxamtʼatʼi putolan. Chai ixtapuvilanalh pumapʼuxamtʼatʼi lackʼajin papaninch. Sich ixtalakchʼita ju na xnapapa ixpumpuʼan. Chai ixtalacpatanumanalh ixcoronaʼan ju si oro ixjunita.

Chai ju lacakʼai putolan ixtaxtui ju makʼalipniʼ. Vachuʼ ixtaxtui ixchivintiʼan ju anuʼ ju ixtachivinin. Chai na pʼas istʼasai ju tʼajin. Chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan ixmaktajita lakatujun maclhcu. Yuchach ju ixpupastaccan ju Spiritu Santu.

Chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ kʼai putolan ixma ju tuʼuʼ tachi lakatam kʼai atantsʼin. Para na kʼox stalankʼa ixjunita. Chai laʼixtalakachoko ju anuʼ kʼai putolan ixʼalin lakatʼatʼi atapacxat. Pumatam laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ. Pumatam laʼixpulacan. Pumatam laʼixlhicana. Chai pumatam laʼixlhimacx. Chai ju anuʼ lakatʼatʼi atapacxat si lana lakchulh ixtajunita laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan chai laʼixpulacanʼan.

Pus ju xapʼulhnan atapacxat chunch istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ león. Chai ju ixlhilakatʼui atapacxat chunch istasui tachi ju satsʼalh vacax. Ju ixlhilakatʼutu atapacxat ixpacxanta ixʼucxpuʼ tachi ixʼucxpuʼ lapanac. Chai ju ixlhilakatʼatʼi atapacxat chunch istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼatsʼokʼo ju alhtʼilitnin.

Chai ju pumatamin ju anuʼ lakatʼatʼi atapacxat ixpacxanta lakachaxan ixpakʼachuʼan. Chai laʼixkʼelhtankʼajpuʼ ju ixpakʼachuʼan chai laʼixʼucxni va si lakchulh ixjunita. Chai tontacuj chai tontatsʼis va tachi ixtamilhpai. Lana jantu tavanan ju jantu tamilhpa. Ixtanajun: Salaka. Salaka. Salaka ju kʼai ucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Yuchi ju ixtʼajun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai yuchi ju catsucukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch.
Pus ju anuʼ atapacxat ixtalakʼayai chai ixtajunich lakʼailaktsʼiuch ju Dios ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan. Yuchach ju tʼonkʼalhi.

Pus va ta pakchux ju chunch ixtalai ju anuʼ atapacxat pus ju pumapʼuxamtʼatʼi papanin ixtataʼaktsokotaich laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan. Yuchi ju jonkʼalhita. Chai ixtalakʼayai. Chai ixtalakamamai ixcoronaʼan laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios chai ixtamilhpani. Chani ixtajuni:

Ji quiʼucxtin chai quiDios aktsʼiya lhijunch ni alakʼayacʼanaʼ chai ni atʼalhonicʼanaʼ. Chai ni alinch ju mintachaput pus lhijunch ni chunch ju aʼulhtʼucʼanaʼ ni uxintʼi ju navikʼotʼa tachi chun ju taxtokni chai laminkʼachat ju alinkʼo.

Chai iclaktsʼilh ju anuʼ ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan ni ixchʼapata laʼixlhicana lakatam alhiqui ju ispasmilhcanta. Chai ju anuʼ alhiqui istsʼokcanta laʼixpulacni chai laʼixmacan. Chai lacatujun ixlakalamcanta.

Chai iclaktsʼilh pumatam anquilh ju na tachapun ixjunita. Chai ju yuchi na pʼas ixtʼajun chiviniʼ ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chani ixtʼajun nonaʼ: ―Tis chavaich ju lhijunch ni laich camalamaconi junta lam lakxtokcanta junima alhiqui chai laich capuxkʼotlh.
Para jantu lai xamatiʼ ixpuxkʼotʼa ju anuʼ alhiqui. Nin anch ju lactʼiyan nin anch ju lacatʼun nin anch laxtankʼajni ju lacatʼun. Nin caʼalilh xamatiʼ ju lai catʼachivinilh.
Chai ju quitʼin slivasalh xackʼalhun ni jantu ixlhitajucanta xamatiʼ ju ixlhijun ni laich capuxkʼotli ju anuʼ alhiqui nin yuchi ni lai catʼachivinilh.

Pus ju acsnich pumatam sia yuʼunch ju papanin ju ixtavilanancha anch chani quijuni: ―Jantu akʼalh. Ju Jesús sastuclich ju macxcai. Chai ju yuchi xaleón junita sia yuʼunch ju makʼaniya ixtamaskʼatʼanti ju Judá chai ju kʼai ucxtin David. Chai ni sastuclich ju macxcai ju yuchi pus laich calamamaconiyaʼ junta lacatujun lakalamcanta chai lai capuxkʼotʼaʼ ju alhiqui.

Chai iclaktsʼilh lakatam Askʼatʼa Borrego. Anch ixya laʼixlacaitat junta ixvi ju kʼai putolan chai junta ixtayanancha ju lakatʼatʼi atapacxat chai junta ixtavilanancha ju papaninch. Chai ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego chunch istasui tachi ju va ixmaknicanta. Chai ju yuchi ixʼalin lakatujun ixʼakalokot chai lakatujun ixlakchulh. Pus ju anuʼ lakchulh yuchi ju Spiritu Santu ju malakachai ju Dios ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.
Pus ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego alh. Chai amaklhtayanalh ju alhiqui ju ixchʼapata laʼixlhicana ju anuch ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan.

Chai acsni amaklhtayanalh ju alhiqui ju Askʼatʼa Borrego pus ju anuʼ ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat chai ixpumapʼuxamtʼatʼiʼan papanin tataʼaktsokotanilh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ Borrego. Chai pumatamin ju yuʼunch ixtachʼapata ixlhisanʼan ju arpa juncan chai ixpumapʼunʼan ju si oro ixjunita. Chai anchach ju ixtaxavai ixpumʼan. Chai ju pum yuchach ixchivintiʼan ju ixlapanacni Dios ju ani lacamunutpaʼ ju tuchi tapuxakʼalai ju Dios.

Chai ju anuʼ atapacxat chai ju papaninch tamilhpa lakatam sastʼi milhpat. Chani ixtanajun: Lhijunch ni uxintʼi ju achʼapʼa ju alhiqui chai alamamacʼonitʼi junta lakalamcanta. Lhijunch ni chunch ju alatʼi ni ixmaknicʼantʼa ju uxintʼi. Chai laminʼacʼalhni alhimalakxtʼutʼa ju lapanacni ju talhilaksich ju Dios. Amalakxtʼutʼa sia yuʼunch ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti chai sia yuʼunch ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.
Chai ju uxintʼi aʼulatʼa kʼai ucxtinin. Chai vachuʼ aʼulatʼa ju palijni ni catalakʼayayach ju quiDiosʼan. Chai ju yuʼunch catalhinonaʼ ju lacamunutpaʼ.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lhu lana ju anquilhnin. Jantu lai ixputekʼekʼocan ni lana na lhu istasui. Pus ju yuʼunch anch ixtayanancha laʼixlacaitat junta ixvi ju kʼai putolan chai junta ixtayanancha ju atapacxat chai ju papanin. Chai ickʼasmatlh ni ixtachivinin ju anquilhnin.

Pʼas ixtachivinin ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai chani ixtanajun: Ixmaknicanta ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Chai lhijunch ni calakʼayacalh. Catanonach ni yuchi ju alin ixmakʼalit chai na kʼox ixtacʼatsan chai na alin ixtachaput. Pus yuchi lhijunch ni calakʼayacalh chai catalhonicalh.

Chai ickʼasmatlh ni ixtachivinin tachi chun ju taxtokni ju navita ju Dios ju tatʼajun ju lactʼiyan chai ju lacatʼun chai ju laxtankʼajni ju lacatʼun chai ju lacaʼalama. Ixchuxʼan chani ixtanajun: Ju vi lacakʼai putolan chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego yuʼunchach ju tucan xalackʼajin. Chach atalhonikʼalhicalh. Chai chach alakʼayakʼalhicalh. Chach noncalh ni na alin ixtachaputʼan. Chunch ju tanaulh.
Chai ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat ixtanajun ni chunch vasalh caʼanavicalh. Chai ju papanin lana tataʼaktsokotanilh. Chai talakʼaya.

Pus iclaktsʼilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconi junta ixlamcanta lacatam. Chai ickʼasmatlh ixchivinti pumatam sia yuʼunch ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat. Chai acsni chivinilh na pʼas istʼasai tachi acsnich tʼasai ju tʼajin. Chani ju quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani.

Pus icʼalh. Chai iclaktsʼilh lakatam caballo ju na xnapapa ixjunita. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixchʼapata ixʼakxmuti chai ixtaknicanta lakatam ixcorona. Pus taxtulh. Chai junta alh lasanaʼ jantu tavanan istsʼankʼai.
Chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconilh ju ixlhilacatʼui junta ixlamcanta pus ickʼasmatlh ju ixchivinti ju ixlhipumatʼui atapacxat. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani.

Chai icʼalh. Chai lana taxtuchokolh alakatam caballo ju na slapulh ixjunita. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixtaknicanta ixpokʼai ni laich camalasani ju lapanacni ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Ju chunch ju lapanacni catalamakniyach. Chai ju anuʼ ju ixpujucʼalh ju caballo xtaknicalh lakatam kʼai espada.

Chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconi ju ixlhilacatʼutu junta ixlamcanta pus ickʼasmatlh ixchivinti ju ixlhipumatʼutu atapacxat. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani. Pus icʼalh. Chai iclaktsʼilh alakatam caballo ju na tsʼiti ixjunita. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixchʼapata lakatam pamakchʼixni laʼixmacaʼ.

Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti tachi ju va anch ixminacha junta ixtayananchalh ju pumatʼatʼi atapacxat. Chai chani ixnajun: ―Ju tam kilo ju trigo lhistʼacan tachi ju lhajacan tamin avilhchan lacalhichʼalhcat. Chai lakatʼutu kilo ju cebada lhistʼacan tachi ju lhajacan tam avilhchan lacalhichʼalhcat. Para jantu catilhitapalalh ju aceite nin yuchi ju vino. ―Chunch ju naulh ju xachivinin.
Pus ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconi ju ixlhilacatʼatʼi junta lamcanta pus ickʼasmatlh ixchivinti ju ixlhipumatʼatʼi atapacxat. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Alaktsʼich ju ani.

Pus icʼalh. Chai iclaktsʼilh alakatam caballo ju na istakta. Chai ju lapanac ju ixpujucʼalh ixjuncan aninti. Chai ju alasaninin tachʼakʼokʼalh. Chai xtaknicalh ju lapanac ixpokʼai ni laich calhinaulh ixmaknica tam cuarto tachi chun ju lapanacni ju ixtatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Laich caʼamakni lacamachita chai lacachavanti chai lacatakʼankʼat chai caʼamamakninin ju maktilin ju alin ju lacamunutpaʼ.

Chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconilh ju ixlhilacaquis junta ixlamcanta pus icʼalacʼavanalh laʼixtankʼapuʼ junta ixavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai ju anch iclaktsʼilh ju ixtacuvinʼan ju lapanacni ju ixʼamaknicanta va ixlacaʼatalh ni ixtalacaʼita ixchivinti Dios chai ni ixtajuni ju anuʼ chivinti ju ixtʼalapanacni.

Chai ju yuʼunch na pʼas tachivinilh acsni chani tanaulh: ―Ji quiʼucxtin ju uxintʼi na salakaʼat. Chai aktsʼiya muctʼaxtʼui ju minchivinti. Pus tus tavananch ju alaktsʼintʼanuyaʼ ju quilhamakʼan quincʼan chai amamalakchʼavaniyaʼich ixlacata ju quinʼacʼalhni quincʼan ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju lacamunutpaʼ. ―Chunch tanaulh ju anuʼ tacuvin.

Pus ju acsnich axtaknicalh ju yuʼunch xnapapa ixpumpuʼan ju pumatamin. Chai ajunicalh ni catapacxalhcaʼ atilacatsʼunin tus acsni catataʼaktsayach ixtʼaxalapanacni chai ixlhiʼalakʼavinʼan ju vachuʼ chunch catapuniyaʼ tachi ju yuʼunch.

Chai iclaktsʼilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego acsni malamaconilh ixlhilacachaxan junta ixlamcanta chai lana na pʼas tataclh ju lacatʼun. Chai ju avilhchan lana na smalaka va tachi ju tuʼuʼ tsʼiti pumpuʼ. Chai ju malhquiyuʼ lana na lapulh va tachi ju acʼalhni.
Chai ju stʼacu tapataju. Tamachilh ju lacatʼun tachi ju tuʼuʼ xalhiʼut qʼuiu ni jopʼon patajui ni sunui ju un.
Chai ju lactʼiyan lana matich va tachi acsni pasmilhcan ju tuʼuʼ alhiqui. Chai tachi chun ju talhpa chai tachi chun ju lactʼicstʼi lacatʼun lacaʼalama si amakʼosukʼocalh.

Pus ju acsnich ju xaʼucxtinin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ chai ju xalackʼajinch chai ju xaʼucxtinin taropajni chai ju makʼalinin chai ju lactachapunin chai tachi chun ju lapanacni mas xalapanacni ixtajunita chai vachuʼ ju yuʼunch ju matiʼ ixjunita ixʼucxtinʼan sich lana tatankʼanukʼo junta pulhucucu talhpa ixjunita chai junta lacvi ju chiux ju lacaqʼuivin.

Chai chani ixtajuni ju anuʼ lactalhpa chai ju anuʼ chiux: ―Apʼatʼaʼutʼitch. Aquilatantʼalhmauch. Chach jantu aquintalaktsʼin ju yuchi ju vi lacakʼai putolan. Chai chach jantu aclaktsʼiu ixtalhkʼamti ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
Chunch aquilaʼulhtuch ni chilh ju avilhchan acsni aquintamamakʼalhkʼajniyan ju Dios. Chai tis chavaich ju lai casastʼucʼaʼ ju yuchi.

Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh pumatʼatʼi anquilhnin. Chai ju yuʼunch ixtayanalh laʼixmakastutʼatʼi ju lacamunutpaʼ chai istasastʼucʼach ju un ju ixajachilh ju makastutʼatʼi ju lacamunutpaʼ. Ju chunch jantu catilalh ju un ju ani lacatʼun nin anch ju lacaʼalama nin yuchi ni lai casunulh ju qʼuiu.

Chai iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ju ixminacha junta xajachilh ju avilhchan. Chai ju yuchi ixchʼapata ixpamichin ju Dios ju lakʼajunta. Chai lana na pʼas axakʼala ju anuʼ ixpumatʼatʼiʼan anquilhnin ju ixʼaxtaknicanta ju ixpokʼaiʼan ni laich catalakʼalhiyaʼ ju lacatʼun chai ju alama.
Chai ju anuʼ anquilh ajuni: ―Tucaʼ alakʼalhitʼit ju lacatʼun nin yuchi ju alama nin yuchi ju qʼuiu. Chach ictimichikʼoyau ju ixlapanacni Dios laʼismuntsanʼan.
Chai ickʼasmatlh ta pumachux ju ixʼamichican. Chaʼalh tam cientos a cuarenta y cuatro milh lapanacni. Asacxtucalh sia yuʼunch ixʼapapanatnich ju pumacautʼuiʼan istsʼalan ju Israel.
Lakacautʼui milh amichicalh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Judá. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Rubén. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Gad.
Chai lakacautʼui milh amichicalh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Aser. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Neftalí. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Manasés.
Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Simeón. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Leví. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Isacar.
Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Zabulón. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju José. Chai lakacautʼui milh ju ixʼapapanatnich ju Benjamín.

Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh aliʼin lhu lapanacni. Jantu lai xamatiʼ ixʼaputʼekʼekʼojui. Ixtataxtutacha ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ junta ixtachʼanxtaminin chai ixtachivinin tijpachux chivinti. Chai ju anuch lapanacni ixtayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios ju ixvi lacakʼai putolan chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego. Chai ixtalakchʼita xnapapa ju ixpumpuʼan chai ixtachʼapata ixʼaxtacnaʼan.
Chai na pʼas ixtachivinin ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chani ixtanajun: Ju quiDiosʼan vi lacakʼai putolan. Pus ju yuchi chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego yuʼunch ju taʼamakʼalhtaxtunun.

Chai chux ju anquilhnin ixtayanankʼo ixtalakachoko junta ixvi ju Dios lacakʼai putolan chai junta ixtayanalh ju papanin chai ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat. Chai ju anuʼ anquilhnin tataquilhputalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios junta ixvi lacakʼai putolan chai talakʼayalh ju yuchi.

Tanaulh: Vasalh chanich canavicalh ju quiDiosʼan. Chach xtaknikʼalhicalh lakʼailaktsʼiuch. Chai chach lakʼayakʼalhicalh ni yuʼunch ju tacʼatsakʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Chach talhonikʼalhicalh yuchi ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Vasalh chach navikʼalhicalh chunch.
Pus ju acsnich pumatam sia yuʼunch ju papaninch quixakʼala. Quisacmi: ―Tis chavaʼitnich ju ani tayanalh ju talakchʼita sasnapapa ixpumpuʼan. Tas anchach ju tamintacha.

Chai ju quitʼin icjuni: ―Uxintʼich ju cʼatsʼai. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Pus yuʼunch ju ani ju tamintacha lacakʼai makʼalhkʼajnat chai tamakpatach ju ixpumpuʼan chai lhixnapapantach laʼixʼacʼalhni ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.

Yuchi talhiyanalh ju laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan junta vi ju Dios. Chai tachʼalhcatnanich tontacuj chai tontatsʼis junta lakʼayacan ju yuchi. Chai ju Dios ju vi lacakʼai putolan yuchi ju vanin caʼalactʼatolaʼ ju tayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ni caʼalhistʼacʼach.
Jantu tavanan catitachavanilh nin yuchi ni lai cataquicxixli. Jantu catitalhini ju ixmacxcat ju avilhchan nin yuchi ni cataʼucsacʼatsa ju ixmacxcat.

Jantu chun catitapasalh ni isʼakstu ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ju calhistʼacʼaʼ. Yuchach ju ya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan. Chai yuchi ju caʼapʼulhniyach. Chai caʼalhiʼanach junta lhu ma ju xcan ju jantu lai xixa. Chai ju Dios yuchi ju camakʼosuyaʼ ju amakʼanita chai jantu xamatiʼ cakʼalhununaʼ.
Acsni malamaconilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ju ixlhilacatujun junta lamcanta pus lana sek tajunkʼo tachi chun ju ixtavilanalh ju lactʼiyan. Tachi paitat hora sek tajunlh.
Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju anuʼ ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios chai axtaknicalh lakatamin iskʼolhʼan.

Chai milh apumatam anquilh chai taya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Pus anch laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan ixjunita. Chai ju anuʼ anquilh ixchʼapata lakatam pumapʼun si oro. Chai na lhu xaxtaknican ju pum ni laich caxavayaʼ junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai acsni ixtatʼajun tʼachivinin ju Dios tachi chun ju ixlapanacni acsnich ju lhu ixavai ju ixpum.
Pus ju xajin ju pum ju ixtʼajun tʼacutnuʼ lacapumapʼun ju ixchʼapata ju anuʼ anquilh alh junta ixvi ju Dios. Va lhiyaulh ixchivintiʼan ju ixlapanacni Dios acsni ixtatʼachivinin.

Pus ju acsnich ju anquilh lhiʼanchokolh ixpumapʼun junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum chai mujulh ju jipi. Astan ju yuchi xtʼekʼemacamilh ju jipi ju lacatʼun. Chai lana tʼasalh ju tʼajin. Chai na pʼas lacchivinincalh. Chai makʼalipnilh. Chai tataclh ju lacatʼun.
Pus ju acsnich ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata lakatamin iskʼolhʼan lana talalhcayaulh ni va ixtaʼasanamputunch.

Pus ju xapʼulhnan anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai lana tamachilh ju lacatʼun ju chajʼit chai ju jipi. Va lhiyalhch acʼalhni. Pus lana lhculh ju lacamunutpaʼ. Para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju lhculh. Chai anch junta lhculh pus lhcukʼo chux ju qʼuiu chai chux ju achʼitin ju stakʼau ixjunita.

Chai ju ixlhipumatʼui anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai ju tuʼuʼ tachi ju kʼai talhpa maktaitavi chai macaʼancalh lacaʼalama. Chai na lhu ju xaxcan alama ju lapa acʼalhni. Para nin ixpaitat ju alama jantu xachaʼan ju acʼalhni.
Chai anch junta lapa acʼalhni pus tanikʼo tachi chun ju atapacxat ju ixtatʼajun ju anch. Chai lana takʼalhikʼo ju barco ju ixtaʼanta ju anch.

Chai ju ixlhipumatʼutu anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai mincha lactʼiyan lakatam kʼai stʼacu. Na kʼai ixmactaiminta tachi tuʼuʼ maclhcu. Chai tajuchilh junta acxtui ju kʼai xcan chai ju xkʼati. Para jantu tajulh nin ixpaitat ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ junta acxtui ju kʼai xcan chai ju xkʼati.

Pus ju anuʼ kʼai stʼacu Ajenjo juncan. Chai ju kʼai xcan ju alin ju lacatʼun lana na sunch va tachi ju achʼitin ju ajenjo juncan. Para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju kʼai xcan ju alin ju ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ ju na sun va. Chai na lhu lapanacni talhini ju xcan ni lana na sun va.

Chai ju ixlhipumatʼatʼi anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai lana takʼalhilh lacatsʼunin ju avilhchan para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju takʼalhi. Chai vana va chunch tapasalh lacamalhquiyuʼ. Takʼalhilh lacatsʼunin para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju takʼalhi. Chai vana va chun tapasalh ju stʼacu. Takʼalhi lacatsʼunin para jantu chaʼalh paitat ju takʼalhi. Pus ju chunch pus lana jantu isʼaktsai tachi ju aktsʼiya ixtamapulhcui. Pus ju tamin avilhchan lakatʼatʼi hora na istsʼista. Chai vana va chun ju tsʼis. Lakatʼatʼi hora jantu lai istasui nin yuchi ju stʼacu.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lakatam kʼatsʼokʼo ju ixʼalhtʼilitnitʼajun laʼixlacaitat lactʼiyan. Chai ickʼasmatlh acsni na pʼas istʼasaʼanta. Ixnajun: ―Painiʼitnich. Painiʼitnich. Painiʼitnich catajunaʼ ju tatʼajun ju lacamunutpaʼ acsni cataskʼolach ju ixpumatʼutuʼan anquilhnin ju titacʼacx.

Pus ju ixlhipumaquis anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai iclaktsʼilh ni patajulh lakatam stʼacu. Tamacha ju lacatʼun. Chai xtaknicalh ju anuʼ stʼacu ju xallave junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Lana jantu lai cʼatsacan tas tus anch ju chaʼan.

Pus ju yuchi malhtekʼa junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Chai lana na lhu xajchilh ju jin. Chunch tachi ju tuʼuʼ jin ju taxtui lacahorno. Pus lana lakapuchʼapakʼo ju avilhchan. Chai tachi ju va paitat tsʼis va va ixlacaʼatalh ju xajin ju taxtulh junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta.
Chai lacajin taxtulh ju silek. Chai taʼakpitsilh ju lacatʼun. Chai axtaknicalh ju yuʼunch ixtachaputʼan tachi ixtachaput ju tuʼuʼ statsucu ju alin ju lacamunutpaʼ.

Chai ajunicalh ni ma jantu catalakʼalhi ju atsʼin ju alin ju lacamunutpaʼ nin ju tuʼuʼ ju stakʼau cava nin tuʼuʼ qʼuiu. Ma va yuʼunch ju lai catamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni ju jantu amichita ju Dios laʼismuntsanʼan.
Chai ajunicalh ni ma laich cataʼamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni lakaquis malhquiyuʼ. Para ma jantu lai catiʼamakni. Pus ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan chunch ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ statsucu acsni atsʼacʼanan.
Chai ju acsni avilhchan ju lapanacni na cataniputunach para jantu lai catitani.

Pus ju anuʼ silek ixtʼachunch ixtatasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ caballo ju mucʼanicanta ju tsasnat pumpuʼ acsni an lacalhilucut. Chai laʼisʼaktsulhʼan ixmucʼacanta ju tuʼuʼ tachi ixcoronaʼan ju si oro. Chai ju ixʼucxpuʼan tachi ixʼucxpuʼ lapanac ixtajunita.
Chai ixʼaiʼan chun ixjunita tachi ixʼai tam chakoʼulh. Chai istatsalatʼan chun ixtajunita tachi istatsalat ju tuʼuʼ león.
Chai laʼixtanquilhakni ixjucʼanilh ju tuʼuʼ tachi tsasnat. Chai ju ixpakʼachu ixmacatʼajun tachi istʼasat lhu carro ju taxakʼamai ju caballo acsni taʼan lacalhilucut.

Chai ixʼalin isʼistaʼan tachi isʼista ju statsucu chai ixʼalin ixpatsʼacʼanʼan. Chai laʼisʼistaʼan anchach ju ixʼalin ju ixtachaputʼan ni lai cataʼamamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju lapanacni. Para ajunicalh ni va lakaquis malhquiyuʼ lai cataʼamamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju lapanacni.

Chai alin ixʼucxtinʼan ju anuʼ silek. Yuchi ju xaʼanquilh junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Junta jantu lai cʼatsacan tas tus anch ju chaʼan. Ju ixtapakaʼut ju anuʼ anquilh lacalhihebreo Abadón juncan. Chai lacalhigriego ma Apolión juncan. Ju chunch va nomputun ni amakniniʼ junita.
Pus tapasalh ju xapʼulhnan makʼalhkʼajnat. Chai timinta alakatʼui makʼalhkʼajnat.

Pus ju acsnich ju ixlhipumachaxan anquilh sunulh ju iskʼolh chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju taxtucha ju laxmakʼastunuxni mixa ju tsupilin makʼastuya. Yuchach ju mixa junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai ju anuʼ tachi mixa ixjunita oro ixlhimanicanta chai ixvi laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios.
Pus ju anuʼ ju ixchivinin xakʼalalh ixlhipumachaxan anquilh ju ixchʼapata ju iskʼolh. Junich: ―Axkʼotʼich ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan anquilhnin ju alacchʼiyocanta laʼixquilhtuʼ kʼai xcan ju Eufrates juncan.

Pus lana axkʼotlh ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan anquilhnin. Pus yuʼunch ju ixʼalaclhcaʼulacanta ixlacata ju anuʼ pantsʼiquis chai ju anuʼ avilhchan chai ju anuʼ malhquiyuʼ chai ju anuʼ cʼata ni laich catamakni lhu lana ju lapanacni. Para jantu ixchaʼanta nin paitat tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ ju camaknicanaʼ.
Pus ju anuʼ anquilhnin tapʼulhnilh ju taropajni ju ixtapuʼanta ixcaballoʼan. Chai ju anuʼ taropajni ixtachaʼanta lakatʼui cientos millón. Pus ickʼasmatlh ni chunch aputekʼecalh.

Pus chani istasui ju caballojni ju iclaktsʼilh tachi ju va laquinʼaklakʼavanti. Pus ju ixtajucʼanalh lacacaballo ixtalactanquilhakvilanalh ju tsasnat ju slapulh ixjunita. Chai azul chai xkavau ixjunita. Chai ju isʼaktsulhʼan ju caballojni chunch istasui tachi isʼaktsulh león. Chai laʼixquilhniʼan ixtapuquilhtaxtui ju jipi chai jin chai azufre.

Chai ju ani lakatʼutu makʼalhkʼajnat tapunilh lhu ju lapanacni. Para jantu chaʼalh nin paitat tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Yuchi ju amaknilh ju jipi chai ju jin chai ju azufre ju ixtaquilhtaxtui ju caballojni.
Pus alin ixtachaputʼan ju caballojni laʼixquilhniʼan chai laʼisʼistaʼan. Pus ju isʼistaʼan chunch ixtajunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ lu ju alin isʼaktsulh chai yuchi ju taputacʼatsani ju lapanacni.

Pus ju aliʼin lapanacni ju jantu xatalhini ju ani makʼalhkʼajnat jantu tavanan tam ixtapastʼacʼa ixlacata tuchi ixtanavi. Va tachi ixtalhilacaʼan ju macxcai un chai ju santo ju lhinavicanta oro chai plata chai ju atumpa tsasnat chai ju va chiux chai ju va qʼuiu. Chunch ixtalai mas jantu lai taʼalacʼavanan ju isantoʼan nin lai catakʼasmatnalh nin yuchi ni lai cataʼalhtanalh.
Chai jantu tavanan tam xatapastʼacʼa ixlacata ju ixʼamaknintiʼan nin yuchi ni ixʼalhicujnutʼan nin yuchi ni va ixtatʼatʼajun va tichi chavaich nin yuchi ni ixtaʼakʼalhonan.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ju na tachapun ixjunita. Chai ju yuchi mincha lactʼiyan. Va milh lacaʼataputsʼi. Chai lakatam quilhmacchat ixlacpajucalh. Chai ju ixʼucxpuʼ chunch istasui tachi ju avilhchan. Chai ju ixchʼajaʼ chunch ixtajunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ makʼakʼai tantun ju na maktajita.
Chai ixchʼapata lakatam lacatʼicstʼi alhiqui ju ixtapuxkʼota. Chai laʼixlhichʼancana putachʼanju lacaʼalama. Chai laʼixlhichʼanmacx putachʼantalh lacatʼun.

Chai lana kʼox pʼas ju chivinilh tachi acsni na pʼas tʼasai ju tuʼuʼ kʼai león. Chunchach ju chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Chai acsni tʼasalh ju anuʼ anquilh pus paktujun tʼasalh ju tʼajin.

Chai acsni istʼasakʼolhch paktujun ju tʼajin pus ju quitʼin xactsʼokʼulaputun tuchi naulh. Para ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju mincha lactʼiyan ju chani xaquijuni: ―Jantu atsʼokʼulatʼi. Va amakʼatʼich lamiʼalhunut ju tuchi xanajun ju tʼajin acsni xatʼasai paktujun.
Chai ju anuʼ anquilh ju iclaktsʼilh ni ixya lacaʼalama chai lacatʼun macʼalh ju lactʼiyan laʼixlhicana.

Chai lhipastacli ju Dios ixpumavasalaca ixchivinti. Lhipastaclh ju Dios ju tʼonkʼalhi. Yuchi ju navilh ju tʼiyan chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju alin ju anch. Chai yuchi ju navilh ju lacatʼun chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju alin ju ani. Chai yuchi ju navilh ju lacatʼun chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju alin ju anch. Pus lhipastacli ju Dios chai naulh ni jantuch aliʼ tuʼuʼ cʼacx. Va yuchi ni caʼuctaxtukʼoyach tachi chun ju ispastacta ju Dios.
Para acsni cachinaʼ ju avilhchan acsni casunaʼ ju iskʼolh ju ixlhipumatujun anquilh acsnich ju cacʼatsacanaʼ ju tuchi ixʼajuni ju Dios ju ixlapanacni para jantu tavanan lai tamachakxa.

Pus ju acsnich ju anuʼ chivinti ju ickʼasmatlh ju minchalh lactʼiyan aktam quixakʼalachokopa. Quijuni: ―Inchich iniʼ ju alhiqui ju tapuxkʼota laʼixmacaʼ ju anuʼ anquilh ju chʼanjui ixtachʼantam lacaʼalama chai ju ixtachʼantam lacatʼunch.

Pus iclakʼalh ju anquilh chai icjunilh ni aquixtaknilh ju lacatʼicstʼi alhiqui. Chai ju yuchi quijuni: ―Nich. Aʼutʼich. Na sun cajunaʼ lamimpajan para ju laminquilhni slivasalh na saksi cajunaʼ tachi ju tuʼuʼ tʼaxcat.

Pus ju quitʼin icʼamaklhtayanalh ju lacatʼicstʼi alhiqui laʼixmacaʼ ju anquilh chai lana icʼulh. Chai vasalh na saksi iclhiula laquinquilhni. Lana chun tachi ju tuʼuʼ tʼaxcat. Para acsni icʼokʼolh pus na sunch va laquimpajan.

Chai icjunicalh: ―Aktsʼiya tasqʼuini ni aʼunchʼokʼoyaʼich ju lapanacni tuchi catapasayaʼ. Aʼunch ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti chai ju kʼai ucxtinin.

Pus acsnich icxtaknicalh kʼantam actiyac ju pulhcacan tuʼuʼ. Chai icjunicalh: ―Akʼostʼaʼulh chai alhcʼatʼich ju ixpujitat Dios chai junta xavanican ju pum ju Dios. Vachuʼ apʼutʼekʼe ju anch taʼan lakʼayanin ju Dios.

Para jantu alhcʼayapʼi ju laʼismakspaʼ ju pujitat. Ju anch axtaknican ju yuʼunch ju jantu talakʼayai ju Dios. Chai lakatʼutu cʼata a paitat catalhinonaʼ ju yuʼunch ju lakʼachakʼan junta lakʼayacan ju Dios.

Chai acʼaxtakniyaʼ ixtachaputʼan ixtʼiyunʼan quilapanacni. Ju chunch laich catanonaʼ ju quinchivinti tam milh a lakatʼui cientos a sesenta avilhchan. Chai catalakchʼiyaʼ ju pumpuʼ tachi ju talakchʼi ju na taʼamakʼaninin.
Yuʼunch ju tachi akʼatʼui xaqʼuiu olivo tajunita. Chai tachi ju lakatʼui ixputayan cantila ju ya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Dios ju amanavin ju lacamunutpaʼ junita.
Chai ni xamatiʼ calactuʼuputunaʼ pus lana taxtui ju alapnaʼ laʼixquilhniʼan ju ixtʼiyunʼan lapanacni. Chai lana amakni ju ixtʼalaxcaiʼan. Pus ni xamatiʼ calactuʼuputunaʼ chunchach ju capuniyaʼ.

Chai ju yuʼunch ixtʼiyunʼan lapanacni axtaknicanta ju ixtachaputʼan ni laich catanonaʼ ni jantu caminaʼ ju xcan tachi chun ju avilhchan ju catatsucuyaʼ nonin ixchivinti Dios. Chai vachuʼ alin ixtachaputʼan ni lai catalapalakʼo acʼalhni ju xcan. Chai lai caʼamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni tijpachux ju makʼalhkʼajnat va tapakchux ju catanaviputunaʼ.

Chai acsni catanavikʼoyaʼ ixlhichʼalhcatʼan ixnajunca ixchivinti Dios pus ju maktiliʼ ju cataxtuyaʼ junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta caʼalactʼalasayaʼ ju yuʼunch. Chai calhajananaʼ ju yuchi. Chai caʼamakniyach ju ixtʼiyunʼan lapanacni.

Chai ixlacatunaʼan catamayaʼ lacati ju lakʼachakʼan junta maknicalh lacacurus ju Jesús. Pus ju Dios najun ni chunch junita ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan tachi ju lakʼachakʼan Sodoma chai tachi ju lacatʼun Egipto.

Pus ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti catalaktsʼiniyach ju ixlacatunaʼan lakatʼutu avilhchan a paitat. Ju anuʼ ixtʼiyunʼan ju xaʼamaknican. Chai jantu calacasqʼuincanaʼ ni lai caʼancalh amacnuca.

Chai ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacatʼun catalhikʼachanach ixlacataʼan ju yuʼunch. Chai catalhicʼataniyaʼ chai catalapuxtakniyaʼ lhakʼailaktsʼin. Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ ni na ixtaʼamamakʼalhkʼajni ju lapanacni ju ixtatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ ju anuʼ ixtʼiyunʼan ixlapanacni Dios.
Para acsni tapasalh ju anuʼ lakatʼutu avilhchan a paitat pus ju Dios axtaknichokolh isʼatsucuntiʼan chai lana takʼostavi junta ixtamanalh. Chai na kʼox tatalhanalh ju talaktsʼilh.

Pus ju acsnich ixtʼiyunʼan takʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Na pʼas ju chivinilh ni laich catakʼasmatʼaʼ. Chanich ju ajuni: ―Atʼatʼitch ju ani. Chai lana tapuʼalh ju ataputsʼi ju lactʼiyan. Chai na kʼoxich talaktsʼilh ju ixtʼalaxcaiʼan.

Chai ju anuʼ pantsʼiquis lana na pʼas tataclh ju lacatʼun. Chai ju tamin cientos chakaʼ ju ixyanalh ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan lakacavin chakaʼ takʼalhikʼo junta lai. Chai acsni tataclh ju lacatʼun pus tani lakatujun milh lapanacni. Chai ju aliʼin na tatalhanalh chai talakʼaya ju Dios ju vilhcha lactʼiyan.
Pus chunch ju tapasalh ju ixlhilakatʼui makʼalhkʼajnat chai vatsʼalhti caʼalinaʼ ju ixlhilakatʼutu.

Pus ju acsnich sunulh ju iskʼolh ju ixlhipumatujun anquilh. Chai lana na pumalhu ju na pʼas ixtachivinacha ju lactʼiyan ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Ixtanajun: Ju chavai quiDiosʼan chai ju Cristo catamalacasuyaʼ ixtachaputʼan. Chai catalhinonkʼalhiyaʼ ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.
Pus ju ixpumapʼuxamtʼatʼi papanin ixtavilanalh lacakʼai ixputolanʼan laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ Dios. Pus ju yuʼunch lana tataquilhputanilh ju Dios chai talakʼayalh.

Ixtajuni: Ji quiʼucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼoʼui tachi chun ju taxtokni uxintʼi ju ixtʼaʼun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai atsʼucʼukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch. Pus iclaxtakniyau lakʼailaktsʼiuch ni chʼapʼatʼa ju mimpokʼai chai lhinaʼunch ju chavai.

Pus ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ tatalhkʼamalh. Para vachuʼ tʼalhkʼamch ju uxintʼi. Chai chilh ju chavai ju avilhchan acsni calaktsʼintanucanach ju tanitach. Vachuʼ chilh ju avilhchan acsni axtʼakniyaʼ ixtalhajaʼan ju milapanacni chai ju ixtanajun ju minchivinti chai ju salaka alaktsʼin chai ju na tatalhoniyan. Axtʼaknikʼoyaʼ chux. Mas yuʼunch ju jantu tuʼuʼ ixtapalhniʼan chai vachuʼ yuʼunch ju xalackʼajin tajunita. Chai chilh ju chavai ju avilhchan acsni amamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju na ixtaʼamamakʼalhkʼajninin ju lacamunutpaʼ.

Pus ju acsnich ju lactʼiyan lana malhtekʼacalh ju laʼixpujitat Dios chai istasui laʼixpulacni ju kʼai pʼaklat junta ixmakʼacanta ju chivinti ju ixʼalaclhitʼatakʼoxita ju Dios ju israelitanin. Chai lana makʼalipnilh. Chai na pʼas lacchivinincalh. Chai tʼasalh ju tʼajin. Chai tataclh ju lacatʼun. Chai tamachilh ju chajʼit.

Chai alilh ju lactʼiyan lakatam kʼai lhamakʼan. Yuchi ni tasu pumatam chakoʼulh ju ixlakchʼita ju avilhchan. Chai ixpuchʼantai ju malhquiyuʼ. Chai laʼisʼaktsulh ixʼalin ixcorona junta ixmucʼacanta lakacautʼui stʼacu.
Chai ixpacxanta isʼaskʼatʼa. Chai ni na ixtʼajun makʼalhkʼajnaʼ pus na pʼas istʼasai ni va laich sokʼon camaklakʼavanalh.

Chai tasuchokopa alakatam lhamakʼan ju lactʼiyan. Yuchi ni tasu lakatam makakʼai lu ju na slapulh ixjunita. Chai ju yuchi ixpacxanta lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakacau ixʼakalokot chai lakatamin ixcorona laʼixlacʼaktsulh.

Chai ju anuʼ kʼai lu laʼisʼista amapatajuni ju stʼacu. Tatamachilh tus lacatʼun. Para jantu ixchaʼanta paitat ju stʼacu ju patajulh. Chai ju anuʼ kʼai lu taya laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju na ixlokʼomputunch ni va caʼixʼunilh ju isʼaskʼatʼa ju ixmaklakʼaulich.

Pus ju chakoʼulh maklakʼaulh pumatam tsʼalh. Yuchach ju kʼai ucxtin catalhimispayaʼ tachi chun ju lapanacni. Chai ju tuchi canonaʼ ju yuchi yuchach ju cataquiclacaʼiyaʼ ju lapanacni. Para ju isʼaskʼatʼa ju anuʼ chakoʼulh lhiʼancalh junta vilhcha ju Dios tus lacakʼai ixputolan.
Chai ju anuʼ chakoʼulh atsʼalaʼalh junta va aseknicʼa junta ixlakʼoxinita ju Dios. Anchach junta lai camavacalh tam milh a lakatʼui cientos a sesenta avilhchan.

Chai alilh ju kʼai lasat ju lactʼiyan. Pus ju Miqui yuchi ju lhinajun laʼixtalhavatʼan ixʼanquilhnin Dios. Pus ju yuchi chai ju ixʼanquilhnin tatʼalasalh ju makakʼai lu chai ju ixʼanquilhnin ju makakʼai lu.
Para tatsʼankʼa ju makakʼai lu chai ixʼanquilhnin. Chai jantu lai tatsuculh ju lactʼiyan.

Pus lana tixcoxtucalh ju lactʼiyan ju kʼai lu. Yuchach ju anuʼ lu ju makʼaniya ixtʼajunch. Yuchach ju lhacaticuru chai Satanás juncan. Yuchach ju aʼokxchokʼoi tachi chun ju lapanacni. Pus acsni lhajacalh ju makakʼai lu acsnich ju tin macamincalh tus ani lacatʼun. Chai ju ixʼanquilhnin alactʼamacamincalh.

Chai ickʼasmatlh ni na pʼas ixchivincan ju lactʼiyan ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Ixnajun: ―Ju chavai chilh ju avilhchan acsni caʼamakʼalhtaxtuyaʼ ixlapanacni ju Dios. Catasuyaʼ ni vasalh alin ju ixtachaputʼan ju Dios chai ju Cristo. Pus putasui ni alin ixtachaputʼan ni tixcauxtucalh ju ixʼachivixtʼakʼa ju quiʼalakʼavinʼan. Tontacuj chai tontatsʼis ixʼan achivixtaknaʼ laʼixmacni Dios.

Para ju quiʼalakʼavinʼan tatʼalalhajalh ju anuʼ kʼai lu. Tapulhajalh ixʼacʼalhni ju anuʼ Askʼatʼa Borrego chai laʼixchivintiʼan junta ixtanajun ni laʼixlhichux ixʼalhunutʼan ixtalhilaksi ju Jesucristo. Chai ju yuʼunch jantu tuʼuʼ ixtalhiulai ju isʼatsucuntiʼan mas catanilhch.

Pus ni alhajanalh ju Cristo pus yuchi calhiʼalinaʼ ju kʼachat ju lactʼiyan. Na catakʼachanach tachi chun ju tatʼajun ju anch. Para painiʼitnich ju uxijnan ju tʼonatʼit ju lacatʼun chai ju lacaʼalama. Painiʼitnich untʼatʼit ni taquilakquilatachin ju uxijnan ju lhacaticuru. Chai slivasalh talhkʼaman ju yuchi ni cʼatsai ni jantu makʼan catichʼalhcatnalh. ―Chunch ju naulh ju anuʼ ju ixchivinin.
Chai ju kʼai lu acsni tixcolhimincalh tus lacatʼun pus lana chʼakʼokʼaxma ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju ixmaklakʼajunta istsʼalh.

Para lana xtaknicalh lakatʼui ixpakʼachu ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Chunch ixjunita ju ixpakʼachu tachi ixpakʼachu ju kʼai kʼatsʼokʼo. Ju chunch ni lai capulackʼosmakʼanaʼ ju kʼai lu. Laich caʼalhtʼilitniʼalh junta aseknicʼa junta ixlakʼoxinita ju Dios. Anchach junta lai camavacalh lakatʼutu cʼata a paitat.
Chai ju anuʼ kʼai lu tsuculh quilhtaxtunuʼ ju xcan tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼai xcan. Chai ju xcan taima ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ni va ixlacasqʼuin ju kʼai lu ni camuxtulh ju anuʼ chakoʼulh.
Para ju lacatʼun aktaijulh ju chakoʼulh. Pus lana lakchʼuchʼuʼokʼo ju xcan. Chai maxixilh ju kʼai xcan ju ixquilhtaxtuta ju kʼai lu.

Pus ju acsnich ju kʼai lu slivasalh tʼalaxcailich ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Pus alh alactʼalasanaʼ ju aliʼin isʼaskʼatʼan ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Yuʼunch ju tamuctaxtui tachi ju najun laʼixlhamapʼaksin ju Dios chai va tachi talhilacaʼanta ju Jesucristo.

Pus ju quitʼin ictachʼantalh lacacucu laʼixquilhtuʼ alama. Chai iclaktsʼilh ni tacutlh lacaʼalama lakatam maktiliʼ. Chai ixʼalin lakacau ixʼakalokot chai lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakatamin ixcorona laʼixʼakalokot. Chai ju lakatamin isʼaktsulh ju yuchi ixmuntiʼulacanta ju tapakaʼut ju lana jantu kʼox lhiulai ju Dios.

Pus ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju iclaktsʼilh chunch ixjunita ju ixlacatuna tachi ju tuʼuʼ leopardo. Chai ju ixchʼajaʼ chunch ixjunita tachi ixchʼajaʼ ju tuʼuʼ oso. Chai ju ixquilhni chunch ixjunita tachi ixquilhni ju tuʼuʼ león. Chai ju kʼai lu xtaknilh ju ani maktiliʼ ixtachaput chai ixpuʼucxtin.

Pus na iscʼatsani ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju lakatam ju isʼaktsulh. Chai istasui tachi ju va lai caʼixpuni. Para macaxnilh junta iscʼatsani. Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacatʼun tachʼakʼokʼalh ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai na talhamakʼaninilh.

Pus ju lapanacni talakʼayalh ju kʼai lu ni ixtaknita ixtachaput ju maktiliʼ. Vachuʼ talakʼayalh ju maktiliʼ. Ixtanajun: ―Tis chavaich ju laich ixtʼachunch cava ju maktiliʼ. Chai tis chavaich ju lai catʼalasa ju yuchi.
Chai ju maktiliʼ xtaknicalh ixtachaput ni laich na jokʼat cachivinilh chai vachuʼ canaulh macxcai chivinti ixlacata ju Dios. Chai yau junicalh ni laich cachʼalhcatnanaʼ lakatʼutu cʼata a paitat.
Pus na macxcai chivinti ixnajun ixlacata Dios chai ixlacata ju ixpujitat Dios chai ixlacataʼan ju tatʼajun ju lactʼiyan.

Chai yau junicalh ni laich caʼalactʼalasa ju talhilacaʼanta ju Cristo chai laich caʼalhajanalh. Chai vachuʼ xtaknicalh ixtachaput ni ixʼucxtinʼan cava tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti.

Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ catalakʼayayaʼ ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Para alin ju lapanacni ju atsʼokʼulacanta laʼixʼalhiqui ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ju ixmaknicanta. Chai anch ju najun tichi chavaich ju alin isʼatsucunti jonkʼalhita. Chai ixtapakaʼut ju kʼantam kʼantam anch ju istsʼokʼulacanta tus acsni tucaʼ ixnavicantacha ju lacamunutpaʼ. Pus ju yuʼunch ju anch atsʼokʼulacanta jantu catitalakʼaya ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.
Pus ni xamatiʼ alin ixpakʼasmatni chach kʼasmatlh.

Ju talhiʼan lacapulachʼin ixtʼalapanac pus vana va chunch ju canavicanaʼ. Chai ju lacamachita amakninin pus lacamachita capumaknichokocanaʼ. Pus yuchi lhitasqʼuini ni catachʼixlh ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju talhilacaʼanta ju Dios chai va tachi catalhilaksilhch ju yuchi.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh alakatam maktiliʼ ju taʼacxtulh ju lacatʼun. Chai ixʼalin lakatʼui lactʼicstʼi ixʼakalokot tachi ixʼakalokot ju tuʼuʼ askʼatʼa borrego. Chai chunch ju ixchivinin tachi ju ixchivinin ju anuʼ makakʼai lu.

Chai ixʼalin ixtachaput tachi ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ. Chai tavilh laʼixpuʼucxtin laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ chai tapʼastu ajuni ju lapanacni ni catalakʼayalh ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ. Yuchi ju macaxnilh junta iscʼatsani chai istasui tachi ju va lai caʼixnilh.
Chai ju anuʼ ixlhilakatʼui maktiliʼ na lai ixnavi ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Mas yuchi ju jipi lai ixmakʼalhtajui ju lactʼiyan. Ixchin ju lacatʼun laʼixʼalacʼavantiʼan ju lapanacni.

Chai yau junicalh ni laich canavi laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju xapʼulhnan maktiliʼ ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Chai yuchi ju apuʼokxchokʼolh ju lapanacni ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. Va ajuni ni catalapalaxtulh tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju iscʼatsani lacamachita para jantu xani.

Chai ixtaknicanta ixtachaput ni laich caxtakniyaʼ isʼatsucunti ju anuʼ lapalaxtucanta tachi ixlacatuna ju maktiliʼ. Pus ju chunch ju anuʼ ju ixlapalaxtucanta naulh ni camaknicanaʼ va tichi chavaich ju jantu calakʼayayaʼ ju yuchi.

Chai ju ixlhipumatʼui maktiliʼ lhinaulh ni camichicalh tachi chun ju lapanacni laʼixlhicana ixlacmacaʼan u laʼismuntsanʼan. Chux ju xalactʼicstʼin chai ju xalackʼajin. Chux ju makʼalinin chai ju quilhpatinin. Chux ju matiʼ ixʼucxtinʼan chai ju va xalapanacni ixtajunita.

Pus ju chunch jantu lai xamatiʼ catitamaulh ju tuʼuʼ u castʼalh ju tuʼuʼ ni jantu michicanta. Pus ju ixʼalhimichican yuchi ixtapakaʼut ju maktiliʼ ju istsʼokcanta lacachivinti u lacaʼaputekʼenta ju alhimispacan ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.

Pus na tasqʼuini ju kʼox acʼatsanti ni lai machakxacan ju ani. Pus ju na lai amachakxanan laich camispayaʼ ixʼaputekʼenti ju maktiliʼ. Pus ju anuʼ aputekʼenti nomputun ixtapakaʼut tam xamatiʼ. Pus ju anuʼ aputekʼenti yuchi ju lakachaxan cientos a sesenta y seis.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju Askʼatʼa Borrego ni ixyacha laxatalhpa Sion. Chai vachuʼ ixtayanancha tam cientos a cuarenta y cuatro milh lapanacni. Chai si ixtalacapavilanankʼo ixtapakaʼut ju Askʼatʼa Borrego chai ixtapakaʼut ju ixpai.

Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju mincha lactʼiyan. Chai istʼasat chunch ixjunita tachi ixtalhavanti xcan chai tachi istʼasat ju tʼajin acsni na pʼas tʼasai. Ju anuʼ chivinti ju ickʼasmatlh chunch ixjunita tachi acsni na lhu sacan ju arpa.

Chai ixtamilhpaich lakatam sastʼi milhpat laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju kʼai putolan junta ixvi ju Dios chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan ju pumatʼatʼi atapacxat chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan ju papanin. Chai jantu xamatiʼ lai xalani ju anuʼ milhpat. Va yuʼunch ju lapanacni ju ixtachaʼanta tam cientos a cuarenta y cuatro milh. Yuʼunch ju ixʼalacmakʼalhtaxtucanta ju lacamunutpaʼ.

Yuʼunch ju jantu tavanan ixtamacajunta ju Dios. Va tachi ixtalhilaksita ju yuchi. Chai yuʼunchach ju tachʼakʼokʼai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego mas vanta anchach ju caʼalh. Yuʼunchach ju pʼulhnan alhimalakxtucanta sia ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ ni laich ixlapanacni catava ju Dios chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
Chai ju yuʼunch jantu tavanan ixtaʼaʼokxchokʼonun. Na salaka tajunita.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ju alhtʼilitniʼalh laʼixlacaitat lactʼiyan. Chai ixlhiʼanta ju chivinti ixlacata ju Cristo ju jantu tavanan catimapaxacalh. Chai ju anquilh yuchi lhilhiʼanta ni laich caʼajunilh tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai ju tachivinin tijpachux chivinti.

Chai ju anuʼ anquilh na pʼas chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Naulh: ―Atʼalhonitʼit ju Dios chai alakʼayatʼit ni chilh ju pantsʼiquis acsni camucʼacanaʼ ju talakʼalhin. Alhilacʼapʼitʼit ju yuchi ju navita ju tʼiyan chai ju lacatʼun chai ju alama chai junta taʼacxtui ju xcan.

Chai apumatam anquilh chʼakʼokʼalh ju xapʼulhnan anquilh. Chai ixnajun: ―Taiʼinicalh ixtachaput ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan Babilonia ni yuchi ju xaʼamalanikʼojui tachi chun ju lapanacni ixkʼachanica ju alactuʼunti tachi ju ixnavi ju yuchi.

Chai ixlhipumatʼutu anquilh chʼakʼokʼalh chai na pʼas chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Pus na pʼas quilhuʼalh ni xamatiʼ calakʼayayaʼ ju maktiliʼ chai ju lapalaxtucanta tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ni calakʼaʼiyaʼ ni camichicalh laʼismuntsan u laʼixmacaʼ pus ju yuchi ma slivasalh camakʼalhkʼajnanaʼ laʼixtalhkʼamti ju Dios. Chai ma lana matiʼ cajunaʼ ju ixʼamapainicaʼan ju acsnich. Ma na camamakʼalhkʼajnicanaʼ lacajipi chai lacaʼazufre laʼixʼucxlacapuʼan ixʼanquilhnin Dios chai laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.

Chai junta tamakʼalhkʼajnan ju yuʼunch ma va tachi jinilatach. Chai ma jantu tavanan catitaʼastacnalh ju yuʼunch ju tamaklacaʼanita ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ ju talapalaxtulh tachi ixlacatuna ju maktiliʼ chai ju alhimichicanta ixtapakaʼut ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Ma tontacuj chai tontatsʼis catamakʼalhkʼajnanaʼ.
Pus ma yuchi lhitasqʼuini ni catachʼixlh ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju talhilacaʼanta ju Cristo. Ma cataquiclacaʼiyach ixlhamapʼaksin ju Dios chai ma va tachi catalhilacaʼanaʼ ju Jesús.

Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Chai quijuni: ―Chanich atsʼokʼulatʼi: “Ma na takʼachan ju tani ju talhilacaʼankʼalhita ju Jesús”. Chai ju Spiritu Santu ma chani najun: “Ma na takʼachan ni taʼastacnantach ju chavai mas na tamakʼalhkʼajnanta ixnavinica ixlhichʼalhcat ju Dios chai mas na talhixkʼopta. Para pastacnikʼalhican tuchi ixtanavinita acsni ixtavilanalhcaʼ ju ani lacamunutpaʼ”.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju xnapapa ataputsʼi. Chai laʼixʼucxni ju anuʼ ataputsʼi ixvi pumatam ju chunch istasui tachi ju yuchi ju malakachachilh ju Dios ni lapanac catsucuyaʼ ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. Chai ixʼalin ixcorona si oro chai ixchʼapata lakatam machita ju na quicxtui chai akxaxcʼavincʼa.

Chai apumatam anquilh taxtuchilh lacakʼai pujitat chai na pʼas chivinilh acsni xakʼala ju anuʼ ju ixvi lacaʼataputsʼi. Chunch ju chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai junich: ―Amanutʼich ju mimachita lacalhitai. Achʼakxʼitʼich ju xatocʼat ju achʼananti. Pus chilh ju avilhchan tachi ju lai apʼuchʼakxʼitʼi ni na cʼatʼatach ju xatocʼat. ―Chunch ju naulh ju anquilh.
Pus ju anuʼ ju ixvi lacaʼataputsʼi lana macatachini ju ixmachita ju lacatʼun. Chai lana puchakxʼikʼo ju xaʼachʼananti.
Chai taxtulh apumatam anquilh lacakʼai pujitat ju yacha lactʼiyan. Chai vachuʼ ixchʼapata ixmachita ju na ixquicxtui.

Pus ju acsnich taxtulh apumatam anquilh junta xavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai ixʼalin ixtachaput ni lai camamactayani ju jipi vanta anchach. Chai ju yuchi lana na pʼas ju chivinilh acsni xakʼala ju anuʼ ixchʼapata ixmachita ju na ixquicxtui. Junich: ―Amanutʼich ju mimachita lacalhitai. Apʼuchʼakxtʼich ju xalhiʼut ju xaqʼuiu uvas ju lacatʼun ni na cʼatʼatach ju xaʼuvas. ―Chunch ju naulh ju anquilh.

Pus ju anquilh puchʼalhcatnalh ju ixmachita ju ani lacatʼun chai lana puchakxʼikʼo ju xaʼuvas ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. Chai macaʼankʼo lacakʼai puchʼipni ni lai camaxtunicanaʼ ju xaxcan. Ju chunch va nomputun ni slivasalh na caʼamamakʼalhkʼajnininaʼ ju Dios laʼixtalhkʼamti.

Pus ju anuʼ kʼai puchʼipni ixya lacamacni ju lakʼachakʼan. Chai ju anuʼ lacapuchʼipni si acʼalhni ju taxtulh tus chaʼalh laʼixkʼalhtsan ju caballo. Chunch ju ixlhikʼalhtankʼai xajun. Chai alhtanalh ju acʼalhni lakatʼutu cientos kilómetros.

Chai iclaktsʼilh alakatam lhamakʼan ju lactʼiyan. Chai slivasalh na kʼai lhamakʼan ixjunita. Pus iclaktsʼilh ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin chai pumatamin ju sia yuʼunch ixtachʼapata lakatamin makʼalhkʼajnat ju tamacamimputun ju ani lacatʼun. Chai ju ani lakatujun makʼalhkʼajnat va yuchach cajunaʼ. Yuchach ju capumaclayaʼ ju Dios ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju axtakni ju lapanacni ju ani lacatʼun.

Pus iclaktsʼilh tachi tuʼuʼ atantsʼin ju na stalankʼa ixjunita. Para istasui tachi ju va ixlhiya ju jipi. Chai anch ixtayanalh laʼixquilhtuʼ ju anuʼ atantsʼin ju lapanacni ju jantu ixtanavinita ixkʼachat ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ lapalaxtucanta tachi ju maktiliʼ. Chai vachuʼ jantu ixtalakʼaʼita ni caʼamichicalh laxalhaputʼekʼenti ixtapakaʼut ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Chai ju yuʼunch ixtachʼapata ju ixʼarpaʼan. Yuchi ju ixʼaxtaknita ju Dios.

Chai ixtamilhpaich ixmilhpat ju Moisés junta istsʼokʼulata. Ju Moisés ixlapanac Dios ixjunita. Chai vachuʼ ixtamilhpai ixmilhpat ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Ixtanajun: Slivasalh na kʼai lhamakʼan ju tuchʼi navi ju uxintʼi ji ucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼoʼui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Soknicʼa ju navi tuʼuʼ chai aktsʼiya muctʼaxtʼui ju minchivinti ju uxintʼi ju kʼai ixʼucxtin unitʼa tachi chun ju amachakʼan lacamunutpaʼ.

Tis chavaich ju jantu catalhoniyan chai jantu calakʼayayan ju uxintʼi ji ucxtin ni va uxintʼi ju salakaʼat. Pus tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ catalakminanch chai catalakʼayayan. Chunch ju aʼulhtʼucʼanaʼ ni laktsʼincʼantʼa ni na soknicʼa ju navi.

Chai acsni tapasakʼo ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh ni ilhtekʼai ju kʼai pujitat lactʼiyan. Anchach junta vi ju Dios chai anch junta ixmakʼacanta ju lhtʼakʼalh chiux junta istsʼokcanta ju lhamapʼaksin.

Pus lacpujitat tataxtulh ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata lakatamin makʼalhkʼajnat ju ixmacamimputun ju lacatʼun. Chai ju yuʼunch ixtalakchʼita ju kʼoxi ixpumpuʼan ju slivasalh na xnapapa ixjunita. Chai ixʼatanquilhakchʼimucʼacanta ju liston ju oro ixjunita.

Chai pumatam ju ixlhipumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat axtaknikʼo ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin lakatamin ixpumapʼunʼan si oro. Chai ju anuʼ pumapʼun isʼaktsamanta ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju camacaminaʼ ju Dios ju tʼonkʼalhi.

Chai ju anuʼ pujitat na aktsamalh ju jin chai malacasucalh ni yuchi ju Dios ju tachapun chai yuchi ju xakʼai tucan. Chai jantu lai xamatiʼ ixtanui ju anch lacpujitat tus catapasakʼoyach ju anuʼ lakatujun makʼalhkʼajnat ju ixtachʼapata ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin.

Pus ju acsnich ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju minchalh lacpujitat. Chani ajuni ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin: ―Inchitʼit. Axtʼekʼemacʼapʼitʼit ju lacatʼun ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju xalhinajun ju Dios ixmacaʼanca. Yuchi ju tajun lacalakatujun mimpumapʼunʼan.

Pus alh ju xapʼulhnan anquilh chai xtʼekʼemacamilh ju lacatʼun ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai lana alilh ju macxcai istsʼitsʼiʼan ju lapanacni ju ixtapacxanta ixlhamichin ju maktiliʼ chai tamaklacaʼanilh ju ixlapalaxtucanta tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.

Pus ju ixlhipumatʼui anquilh vachuʼ xtʼekʼemacamilh ju lacaʼalama ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai lana tapalakʼo acʼalhni tachi ju tamai acʼalhni junta lamaknican. Pus tachi chun ju atapacxat ju ixtʼajun lacaʼalama tanikʼo.
Chai ixlhipumatʼutu anquilh vachuʼ xtʼekʼemacamilh ju lacxcan ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Vachuʼ taju junta taʼacxtui ju xcan. Pus lana si acʼalhni jonkʼo.

Chai ickʼasmatlh ni chivinilh ju anquilh ju lakʼalhilh ju xcan. Chani naulh: ―Aktsʼiya soknicʼa ju navi acsni xtʼakʼa ju chunch makʼalhkʼajnat ji uxintʼi ju na salakaʼat. Ju uxintʼi tʼaʼun chai tus va tavananch ixtʼaʼun.

Chunch icjunan ni yuʼunch ju amamakʼalhkʼajni ju chavai ju taʼamaxtunilh ixʼacʼalhniʼan ju milapanacni chai ju ixtanajun ju minchivinti. Chai ju chavai ju uxintʼi amakʼotʼutʼa ju xcan ju lapʼalatʼi acʼalhni. Pus ixlhijunch ni chunch ju caʼaʼulhtucalh.

Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju taxtuchalh junta ixavanican ju Dios ju pum. Chai chani naulh: ―Ji ucxtin Dios ju lai navikʼoʼui tachi chun ju taxtokni ju uxintʼi aktsʼiya muctʼaxtʼui ju minchivinti chai sok ju navi acsni xtʼakʼa ju makʼalhkʼajnat. ―Chunch ju naulh.

Pus ju ixlhipumatʼatʼi anquilh xtʼekʼemacaʼalh ju lacaʼavilhchan ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai xtaknicalh ju avilhchan ixtachaput ni laich slivasalh caʼalacamaccha ju lapanacni chai catalackʼaimakataxtulh.

Pus ju lapanacni slivasalh na talaclacacha ju lacaʼascʼunuʼ. Chai na macxcai chivinti tajunilh ju Dios ju ixlhinajun ni caʼalilh ju chunch makʼalhkʼajnat. Para nin chunch jantu tavanan tam tapastaclh nin yuchi ni laich catalakʼaya.

Chai ju ixlhipumaquis anquilh xtʼekʼemacamilh laʼixputolan ju maktiliʼ ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Pus lana putsʼiskʼo junta ixlhinajun ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju ixtacutcha lacaʼalama. Chai ju lapanacni na ixtapakʼatsʼi ju isimakʼatʼan ni na ixtamakʼalhkʼajnan.

Chai tajuni macxcai chivinti ju Dios ju vilhcha lactʼiyan ni ixtatʼajun makʼalhkʼajnin ni na lhu lana ixʼalin ju istsʼitsʼiʼan. Para mas chunch ju ixtamakʼalhkʼajnan jantu tavanan tam tapastaclh ixlacata ju tuchi ixtanavi.

Pus ju ixlhipumachaxan anquilh xtʼekʼemacamilh laxakʼai xcan Eufrates ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Pus lana xixkʼo ju xcan. Ju chunch ni jantu xcai catatapasayaʼ ju xaʼucxtinin ju cataminanta ju lhichʼatoʼanta ni va cataminaʼ lasanin.

Chai iclaktsʼilh pumatʼutu lhacaticurulhni. Ju pumatam taxtulh laʼixquilhni ju kʼai lu. Chai pumatam taxtulh laʼixquilhni ju maktiliʼ. Chai apumatam taxtulh laʼixquilhni ju anuʼ lapanac ju istasui tachi ixlapanac Dios mas jantu. Chai ju anuʼ ixpumatʼutuʼan chunch istasui tachi ju tuʼuʼ venkʼen.

Pus ju yuʼunch lhacaticurulhni tajunita. Chai lai tanavi ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Pus talakʼan ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ ni va tamakʼaixtokputun ni laich catalasayaʼ acsni cachinaʼ ju kʼai avilhchan. Ju acsnich catatʼalasayaʼ ju Dios ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni.

Acsnich ju caminaʼ ju Jesús tachi ju naulh. Chunch tachi tam akʼalhonaʼ ni chin acsni jantu cʼatsacan ni laich cachilh ju acs pantsʼiquis. Pus na kʼachanch ju skʼala tsucui chai lhistʼacʼa ju snapapa ixpumpuʼ ni jantu va kʼai tsasau cajunlh chai camaxanalh ni matiʼ ju xnapapa ju ixpumpuʼ.
Pus amakʼaixtokcalh ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin junta Armagedón juncan lacalhihebreo.

Chai ju ixlhipumatujun anquilh xtʼekʼemacaʼalh ju lacaʼun ju tuchi ixtajun laʼixpumapʼun. Chai lana taxtulh lakatam chivinti lacpujitat. Anchach junta ixya ju kʼai putolan. Chai ixnajun: ―Va yuchach ju ani ju makʼalhkʼajnat.

Chai lana makʼalipnilh. Chai na pʼas lacchivincalh. Chai na pʼas tʼasalh ju tʼajin. Chai na pʼas tataclh ju lacatʼun. Pus tus acsni tavanan alilh ju lapanacni ju ani lacamunutpaʼ jantu tavanan ixlaktsʼincanta ni catataclh ju lacatʼun tachi ju lalh ju acsni.

Pus ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan ju Babilonia ixjuncan pumakatʼutu pupaklh chai takʼalhikʼo. Chai tachi chun ju kʼai lakʼachakʼanixni ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ lana takʼalhikʼo. Chai ju Dios pastaclh ju talakʼalhin ju ixtanavita ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan. Chai naulh ni vasalh camispayaʼ ixtatsʼinqʼuit ju ixtalhkʼamti.
Pus tachi chun ju lactʼicstʼi lacatʼun ju ixvi lacaʼalama tatsʼankʼakʼo. Chai matiʼ va ju talhpa.

Chai lackʼai chajʼit ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Ixtatsʼinqʼui tachi tʼupʼuxam kilo ju lakatamin. Chai ju lapanacni tajuni macxcai chivinti ju Dios ixlacata ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju alilh ni tamachilh ju chajʼit. Slivasalh na kʼai lhitalhan va.

Pus ju acsnich quilakmilh pumatam sia yuʼunch ju anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata ju lakatamin ixpumapʼunʼan. Chai quijuni: ―Asokʼoch. Chai acmasuniyanch ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnat ju anuʼ alactuʼunu chakoʼulh ju na lhu puvi ju xcan.

Yuchach ju tatʼaʼalactuʼununta ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju lacamunutpaʼ. Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju ani lacamunutpaʼ tachi ju va talhitʼakʼapʼatach ju va ixkʼachanicach ju ixʼalactuʼuntiʼan ju xaʼamasuni ju anuʼ chakoʼulh.

Chai ju Spiritu Santu xaquimapaxanita ju quiʼalacʼavanti chai iclaktsʼilh ju ani tachi ju va laquiʼaklakʼavanti. Pus tachi ju va quilhiʼalh ju anuʼ anquilh junta na aseknicʼa ixjunita. Chai iclaktsʼilh pumatam chakoʼulh ju ixpujucʼalh lakatam maktiliʼ ju na slapulh ixjunita. Chai laʼixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ si lana istsʼokʼulacanta macxcai tapakaʼut. Chai ixʼalin lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakacau ixʼakalokot.

Chai ju chakoʼulh ixlhimalakchʼininta morado chai slapulh pumpuʼ. Chai ixlhimaxantilacanta ju oro chai aliʼ lactʼicstʼi chiux ju na laklhu ixtapalh chai ju perlas. Chai ixchʼapata lakatam tasa si oro. Ju yuchi na ixʼaktsamanta ju tuchi na tsʼisi ju Dios chai ju tuchi na lhquiliqui ju navi laʼixʼalactuʼunti.
Chai ixmuntitsʼokcanta lakatam tapakaʼut ju jantu lai machakxacan. Chai ixnajun: “Xakʼai Babilonia. Ixnatiʼan ju lakachapu tʼacunin chai ju taxtokni ju na lhitsʼisit ju alin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ”.

Chai iclaktsʼilh ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ni na ixlhitʼakʼapʼatach ju ixʼacʼalhniʼan ju lapanacni ju ixtalhilacaʼanta ju Jesús ni ixlhinajuntach ixʼamaknica. Chai acsni iclaktsʼilh slivasalh iclhamakʼaninilh ju tuchi xacmasunicanta.

Para ju anquilh quijuni: ―Tajuch ni va lhamakʼanininch ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Quitʼin ju acmavasalaniyan ju ixlacata ju anuʼ chakoʼulh chai ixlacata ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju pujucʼalh. Yuchi ju alin lakatujun isʼaktsulh chai lakacau ixʼakalokot.

Pus ju anuʼ slapulh maktiliʼ ju xalaktsʼin ixtʼajun para ju chavai nitach. Para cataʼacxtuchokotachilh junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Para aktsʼiya camaclacanaʼ. Chai na catalhamakʼanininaʼ ju maktʼiliʼ ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ju lacamunutpaʼ acsni catalaktsʼinchokoyaʼ ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Para ju chunch catalayaʼ jantu atsʼokʼulacanta lacaʼalhiqui junta najun tichi chavaʼitnich ju alin ju isʼatsucuntiʼan ju jonkʼalhita. Pus ixtapakaʼutʼan ju kʼantam kʼantam ju alin isʼatsucunti jonkʼalhita istsʼokʼulacantacha tus acsni tucaʼ ixnavicanta ju lacamunutpaʼ. Para ju aliʼin lapanacni catalhamakʼanininaʼ ju maktiliʼ ni talaktsʼinchokoi ju yuchi. Tacʼatsai ni ixtʼajun para nilh chai ju chavai tʼonchokoi.
Pus ju ani na tasqʼuini ju kʼox acʼatsanti ni acmachakxa. Pus ju anuʼ lakatujun isʼaktsulh ju maktiliʼ yuchi ju laktsʼipaxcavacan ju anuʼ lakatujun talhpa junta vi ju chakoʼulh.
Vachuʼ laktsʼipaxcavacan ixpumatujunʼan kʼai ucxtinin. Pus ju ixpumaquisiʼan alhajacalh. Ju pumatam tʼajuncaʼ. Ju pumatam tucaʼ tasui. Para acsni caminach jantu makʼan catolaʼ laʼixpuʼucxtin.
Chai ju anuʼ maktiliʼ ju ixtʼajun chai nitach ju chavai yuchach ju ixlhipumatsajin ucxtin cajunaʼ. Ixtʼalapanac cajunaʼ ju ixlhipumatujunʼan ju pʼulhnan ixtatʼajun. Para vachuʼ camaclacanaʼ.

Chai ju anuʼ lakacau ixʼakalokot ju anuʼ slapulh maktiliʼ ju laktsʼintʼa yuchi laktsʼipaxcavacan ju ixpumacauʼan ucxtinin. Ju yuʼunch tucaʼ axtaknican ixpuʼucxtinʼan. Para catʼaʼaxtaknicanaʼ ju maktiliʼ ixpokʼaiʼan chai va tam hora ju lai catalhinonaʼ.
Ju yuʼunch va lakatam junita ixʼatalacpastʼacʼatʼan. Chai taxtakni ixpokʼaiʼan ju anuʼ maktiliʼ.

Chai ju yuʼunch catatʼalasayaʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Para ju Askʼatʼa Borrego calhajananaʼ ni yuchi ju tucan ucxtin tachi chun ju ucxtinin. Chai yuchi ju tucan xakʼai tachi chun ju xalackʼajin. Chai ju alactʼavi atʼasanicanta chai asacxtucanta chai na tamuctaxtui ju ixchivinti ju yuchi.

Chai vachuʼ chani quijunilh ju anquilh: ―Ju anuʼ xcan ju laktsʼintʼa junta ixvi ju anuʼ alactuʼunu chakoʼulh yuchi laktsʼipaxcavacan tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ chai tachivinin tijpachux chivinti.

Chai ju anuʼ lakacau akalokot ju laktsʼintʼa ju ixlaccʼatujucalh ju anuʼ maktiliʼ cataxcayach ju chakoʼulh. Chai ixlacataʼan ju yuʼunch camaconicanaʼ ju anuʼ chakoʼulh. Chai ju yuchi va kʼai tsasau camaconicanaʼ. Chai ju lakacau akalokot chai ju maktiliʼ tachi ju va catakʼaiʼuyach ixʼacanit chai catalacxavayach ju caxajanta.

Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ ni Dios ju xaʼamapastʼacʼani ni chunch ju catalalh tachi ju lhilhcata ju yuchi. Pus ju anuʼ lakacau akalokot catanaviyaʼ tachi ju lhilhcata ju Dios acsni va lakatam cajunaʼ ixʼatalacpastʼacʼatʼan chai acsni cataxtakniyaʼ ixpuʼucxtinʼan ju maktiliʼ tus acsni caʼuctaxtuyanta ju ixchivinti Dios.
Chai ju anuʼ chakoʼulh ju laktsʼintʼa laktsʼipaxcavacan ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan ju alhijuni tachi chun ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ. ―Chunch ju xaquijuni ju anquilh.

Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus iclaktsʼilh apumatam anquilh ni taxtucha ju lactʼiyan. Milhch ju lacatʼun. Chai ixpacxanta ju kʼai ixtachaput. Chai ju ani lacatʼun lana mapulhcukʼo laʼixʼamatuncunit.

Chai na pʼas chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai chani naulh: ―Lakʼalhikʼocalh ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan Babilonia. Valhch ixchakaʼan ju lhacaticurulhni. Vachuʼ anch tatanumanalh tachi chun ju tsʼokʼo ju va lhitsʼisi tavajin.

Chunchach ju ulhtucalh ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan ni yuʼunch ju amachakʼan anch ju xataʼamalanikʼojui tachi chun ju lapanacni ixkʼachanica ju alactuʼunti tachi ju ixtanavi ju yuʼunch. Chai ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju lacamunutpaʼ tatʼaʼalactuʼunulh ju yuʼunch. Chai ju saʼastʼanin ju lacamunutpaʼ na makʼalinin tapujunita ni va ixtalhakʼamanan ixtuminʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan.

Pus ju acsnich ickʼasmatlh alakatam chivinti ju mincha lactʼiyan ju chani ixnajun: ―Atʼaxtʼutʼit ju anch ji quilapanacni. Jantu xcai ni vachuʼ amaknavitʼit ju alactuʼunti. Jantu xcai ni atʼamakʼalhkʼajnantʼit ju yuʼunch vachuʼ.
Pus ju ixʼalactuʼuntiʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan chaʼanta tus lactʼiyan. Chai ju Dios jantu tavanan xacʼapʼa ju alactuʼunti ju xatanavi. ―Chunch ju naulh ju xachivinin.

Pus ni na ixtaʼalactuʼunun ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan yuchi chani alhijunicalh ju anquilhnin: ―Pus chunch ju axtʼaknitʼit ju makʼalhkʼajnat tachi ju ixtaxtʼakʼach ju yuʼunch. Paktʼui amamapʼalanitʼit ju makʼalhkʼajnat tachi ju ixtaʼalacnavich ju aliʼin. Chai ju vino ju taʼamakʼotʼunulh yuʼunch pus ju chavai amakʼotʼutʼit ju vino ju palai tucan sunilhcʼacʼa.

Chai tachi ju yuʼunch ni na kʼai ixtacʼatsan chai na lhu ixtaʼalactuʼunun pus vana va chun lhu amamakʼalhkʼajnitʼit chai lhu amamakʼaninitʼit ju yuʼunch. Pus ju yuʼunch tanajun laʼixʼalhunutʼan ni xalackʼajin tajunita chai jantu va amaconcanta chai jantu tavanan cataʼamakʼanininaʼ.

Chai ni tanajun ju chunch pus ixlhiyuchi lana va tam pantsʼiquis caʼalinaʼ ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan. Cataniyaʼ ju lapanacni. Chai caʼalinaʼ ju amakʼanit chai ju chavanti. Chai calhcukʼoyaʼ ju lakʼachakʼan. Chunch ju canavicanaʼ ni na tachapun ju ucxtin Dios. Chai yuchach ju amucʼani ju ixtalakʼalhinʼan. ―Chunch ju ajunicalh ju anquilhnin.

Chai na catalackʼalhunach. Chai ai ai catanonaʼ ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju lacamunutpaʼ ju tatʼaʼalactuʼunulh ju yuʼunch chai tatʼanavilh ju ixkʼachatʼan. Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ acsni catalaktsʼinaʼ ju xajin ni catsucuyaʼ lhcunuʼ ju lakʼachakʼan.

Na makat catatayayaʼ ni va tatalhonich ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan. Chai chanich ju catanonaʼ: ―Painich ju xakʼai lakʼachakʼan Babilonia. Na tachapun ixjunita. Para va tam pantsʼiquis xamin ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnat.
Chai tachi chun ju saʼastʼanin ju ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ na catalhikʼalhunach ju yuchi. Chai ai ai catanonaʼ. Chunch ju catanaviyaʼ ni matich ju ixʼatamonaʼan.

Na istastʼai ju oro chai plata chai chiux ju na laklhu ixtapalh ixjunita chai ju perlas chai ju kʼoxiya pumpuʼ ju lino juncan chai ju morado pumpuʼ chai ju pumpuʼ ju seda juncan chai ju lakslapulh pumpuʼ chai tachi chun ju qʼuiu ju na kʼox acamin chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju navicanta lacakʼai istatsalat ju elefante chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju lhinavicanta qʼuiu ju na laklhu ixtapalh chai ju cobre chai ju tsasnat hierro chai ju chiux ju marmol juncan.

Vachuʼ istastʼai ju canela chai ju aliʼ xalhalakʼoxin vaiti chai ju pum chai ju perfume chai ju vino chai ju aceite chai ju harina chai ju trigo chai ju vacax chai borrego chai caballo chai carro chai xalapanacni. Va istastʼai ixtʼalapanacniʼan. Chai ju isʼastʼacan mas ixtachʼalhcatnan para jantu tuʼuʼ ixtalhajai ni va ixʼatamocanta.

Pus ju anuʼ astʼanin chani catajunach ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan: ―Tachi chun ju lhiʼut ju na ixʼupʼutʼunatʼit cʼacxtach ju chavai. Chai tachi chun ju taxtokni ju na lackʼox ixjunita chai ju na cʼus istasui tacʼacxkʼolh. Chai jantu tavanan atʼalaktsʼinchʼokʼotʼit. ―Chunch ju catanonaʼ ju astʼanin.

Chai ju istastʼai ju anch ju lakʼachakʼan ju ani taxtokni chai ju na makʼalinin xatapujun na makat catatayayaʼ ni na catatalhoniyaʼ ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnatʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan. Na catakʼalhunaʼ. Chai ai ai catanonaʼ.

Vachuʼ chani catanonach: ―Painiʼitnich ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan ju na ixʼalin ju lackʼoxi ixpumpuʼan ju lino juncan chai ju lacmoradonicʼa ixpumpuʼan chai lacslapulh ixpumpuʼan. Chai na ixtalhachʼachʼinincanta ju oro chai ju lacatʼicstʼi chiux ju na laklhu ixtapalh chai ju perlas.

Para va tam pantsʼiquis tsʼankʼakʼolh tachi chun ju ani ixmakʼalitʼan. Chai vachuʼ na makat catatayayaʼ tachi chun ju amanavin barco chai ju tapuʼalhtananch ju barco chai ju tachʼalhcatnan lacabarco chai tachi chun ju tachʼalhcatnan lacaʼalama.

Chai acsni catalaktsʼinaʼ ju xajin ni tʼajun lhcunuʼ pus na pʼas catalacchivinaʼ ni na cataʼamakʼanininaʼ. Catanonach: ―Matiʼ alakatam lakʼachakʼan ju ixtʼachunch cava tachi ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan. ―Chunch ju catanonaʼ.

Chai catamucʼayaʼ ju pokxni laʼisʼaktsulhʼan ni cacʼatsacanaʼ ni na taʼamakʼaninin. Chai na catalackʼalhunaʼ. Chai ai ai catalacnonaʼ. Pʼas catachivinaʼ acsni chani catanonaʼ: ―Painich ju kʼai lakʼachakʼan. Tachi chun ju quijnan ju amanavin barco icjuntau xacpuchʼalhcatnanau lacaʼalama chai na makʼalinin xacpujuntau ju ixmakʼalitʼan ju amachakʼan ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan. Para va tam pantsʼiquis ju takʼalhikʼo ju lakʼachakʼan.

Alhikʼachʼantʼit ji amachakʼan lactʼiyan chai ju uxijnan ju lhilacʼapʼinatʼit ju Jesús chai ju uxijnan ju ixtamalakachan Jesús untʼatʼit chai ju uxijnan ju nonatʼit ixchivinti Dios. Chunch ju alatʼit ni milacataʼan ju xamamakʼalhkʼajni ju Dios ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan.

Pus ju acsnich pumatam anquilh ju na tachapun ixjunita chʼapalh lakatam chiux tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼai xvati. Chai tarr macaʼalh lacaʼalama. Naulh: ―Tachi ju anuʼ chiux ni lacatachaput ju makʼancalh chai taʼacnukʼalhi lacxcan pus chunch vachuʼ canavicanaʼ ju Babilonia ju anuʼ kʼai lakʼachakʼan. Chai vachuʼ jantu tavanan lai catitasuchokolh.

Chai jantu tavanan catikʼasmatcalh ju anch ju isʼasanti arpa nin yuchi ju milhpat nin yuchi ju skʼolh. Vana jantu tavanan calhitajucalh anch ju ixnavini tijpachux lhichʼalhcat. Chai jantu catikʼasmatcalh ju anch ni calacsquiticalh.
