Jantu tavanan catimapulhcu ju anch tuʼuʼ maclhcu. Nin yuchi ni cakʼasmatcalh ju anch ju ixchivintiʼan ju na talackʼachan ni va ancaʼ tamakʼaxtʼokʼa. Chunch cajunaʼ mas xalackʼajin ixtajunita ju saʼastʼanin ju anch lakʼachakʼan. Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ alacpuʼokxchokʼolh laʼixʼalhicujnut.

Chai laʼixpulacni ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan amaknicancha ju ixtanajun ixchivinti Dios chai ju ixtalhilacaʼanta ju Jesús. Chai ju amachakʼan anch yuʼunch ju talhinaulh ixʼamaknicaʼan tachi chun ju ixlapanacni Dios ju ixtatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ.

Chai acsni tapasakʼolh ju ani taxtokni pus ickʼasmatlh lhu chivinti tachi ju na va lhu lapanacni ixtachivinin ju lactʼiyan. Ixtanajun: Calakʼayauch ju Dios. Yuchach ju xaquintamakʼalhtaxtuyan. Chai yuchach ju calakʼayacalh. Chai yuchach ju alin ixtachaput.

Yuchi calhiʼulhtucanaʼ chunch ni aktsʼiya muctaxtui ju ixchivinti chai sok navi acsni xtʼakʼa ju tuʼuʼ makʼalhkʼajnat. Pus xtaknilh ju ixmakʼalhkʼajnat ju kʼai alactuʼunu chakoʼulh ju lakʼalhita ju lacamunutpaʼ laʼixʼalactuʼunti. Chai ju quiDiosʼan vachuʼ amamapalhni ixʼacʼalhniʼan ju ixlapanacni.
Chai aktam tanonchokopa ju ixtalhavatʼan: ―Calakʼayau ju Dios ni jantu tavanan lakmixa ju xajin junta tʼajun lhcunuʼ ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan.

Pus ju ixpumapʼuxamtʼatʼiʼan papanin chai ju ixpumatʼatʼiʼan atapacxat tataʼaktsokotanilh chai talakʼayalh ju Dios ju vi lacakʼai ixputolan. Ixtajuni: ―Vachuʼ iclacasqʼuinau ni chunch ju caʼulhtucalh ju Dios. Vachuʼ calakʼayayau.

Chai vachuʼ ju lacakʼai putolan mincha lakatam chivinti junta naulh: Alakʼayatʼit ju quiDiosʼan tachi chun ju uxijnan ju ixlapanacni untʼatʼit. Chux ju uxijnan ju tʼalhoniyatʼit mas xalactʼicstʼin untʼatʼit chai vachuʼ ju uxijnan ju xalackʼajin untʼatʼit.

Pus ju acsnich ickʼasmatlh ju chivinti tachi ju na va lhu ixlacchivincanch. Chai ju iskʼasmatca chunch ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ atalhavana xcan. Tachi acsni na tʼasai ju tʼajin. Pus ju yuʼunch chani ixtanajun: Calakʼayau ni yuchi ju lhinajun. Yuchi ju quiʼucxtinʼan Dios ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni.
Cakʼachanauch chai calakʼayauch ju yuchi ni chilh ju ixputamakʼaxtokni ju Askʼatʼa Borrego chai malakchʼininkʼotach ju isʼasqʼuininti.

Chai xtaknicalh ju yuchi ju kʼoxi pumpuʼ ju lino juncan. Chai ju yuchi na xlipnicʼa junita chai na snakʼankʼa. Pus ju anuʼ na kʼoxi pumpuʼ laktsipaxcavacan ju tuʼuʼ kʼox ju tanavita ju talhilacaʼanta ju Jesús.

Chai ju anquilh quijuni: ―Atsʼokʼulatʼich ju acjunan: “Ma na takʼachan ju caʼatʼasanicanach lacalacvaiti acsni catamakʼaxtʼokʼaʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego”. Vachuʼ chani quijuni: ―Ju ani chivinti slivasalh ni yuchi ju Dios ju chunch xanajun.

Pus ju acsnich ictaʼaktsokotanilh vanin laʼixchʼajaʼ ju anuʼ anquilh ni va xaclakʼayaputun. Para ju yuchi quijuni: ―Jantu chun aqʼuiʼulhtʼu ni va mintʼaxalapanac icjunita chai ixtʼaxalapanac ju miʼalakʼavin ju tajuni ju lapanacni ixlacata ju Jesús. Alai yuchi ju Dios ju alakʼayatʼi. ―Chunch ju xaquijuni ju anquilh. Pus ju ixlapanac Dios junita yuchi ju vas najun ju chivinti ixlacata ju Jesús.

Chai iclaktsʼilh ju tʼiyan ni ilhtekʼai chai ixya lakatam caballo ju na xnapapa. Chai ju ixpujucʼalh yuchi ju lai lhilaksican chai najun ju stavasalanti. Chai ju yuchi acsni lakʼoxi tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan chai acsni lasai pus sok ju navi.
Chai ju yuchi kʼai lam lam ixtalakpuyajui tachi ju tuʼuʼ xaʼalapnaʼ jipi. Chai na lhu ixʼalin ju ixcorona. Chai ju anuʼ tapakaʼut ju ixvilhnilh jantu xamatiʼ ixmachakxai. Va isʼakstu ixmachakxai.
Chai ixlakchʼita lakatam ixpumpuʼ ju lana istsʼamkʼota acʼalhni. Chai ju ixpujucʼalh ju caballo lhimapakaʼucanta ixchivinti Dios.
Chai tachi chun ju xataropajni lactʼiyan si lacxnapapa caballo ixtapuchʼakʼokʼata chai ixtalakchʼita lackʼoxi pumpuʼ ju lino juncan. Chai na xnapapa chai na salaka ixjunita.

Chai ju xaʼapʼulanaʼ ixquilhtaxtuta lakatam espada ju na quicxtui. Yuchi ju caʼaputʼalasayaʼ ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Chai ju tuchi canonaʼ ju yuchi pus yuchach ju cataquiclacaʼiyaʼ ju lapanacni. Pus yuchach ju caʼamamakʼalhkʼajniyaʼ ju lapanacni laʼixtalhkʼamti ju Dios.
Chai laʼixpumpuʼ chai laʼixkʼatuʼ lacvilhnilh ixtapakaʼut. Chani najun: “Yuchi ju ani ju palai xakʼai tachi chun ju xalackʼajin. Chai yuchi ju palai xakʼai ucxtin tachi chun ju ucxtinin”.
Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh pumatam anquilh ju ixya lacaʼavilhchan. Chai na pʼas axakʼala tachi chun ju tsʼokʼo. Ajuni: ―Atʼatʼit. Atʼakʼaixtʼoktʼit ni canaviyaʼ lakatam kʼai lacvaiti ju Dios.

Laich aʼuniyaʼitʼit ju ixʼacanitʼan ju xalackʼajin chai ju xaʼucxtinin taropajni chai ixʼacanitʼan ju lactachapunin lapanacni chai ixʼacanitʼan ju caballo chai ju ixtapujucʼanalh chai ixʼacanitʼan va tichi chavaich. Yuʼunch ju matiʼ ixʼucxtinʼan chai yuʼunch ju va xalapanacni tajunita. Yuʼunch ju salactʼicstʼin chai ju xalackʼajin.

Chai iclaktsʼilh ni ixtatakʼaixtokta ju maktiliʼ ju ixtacuttacha lacaʼalama chai ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ chai chux ju ixtaropajniʼan. Va catatʼalasayaʼ ju pujucʼalh ju xnapapa caballo chai ixtaropajni ju yuchi.

Pus tachʼinin tava ju maktiliʼ chai ju lapanac ju istasui tachi ixlapanac Dios mas jantu. Yuchi ju ixnavich ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju maktiliʼ chai ixʼalacpuʼokxchokʼota ju lapanacni ju ixʼalhimichicanta ixtapakaʼut ju maktiliʼ chai yuʼunch ju ixtalakʼayai ju ixlapalaxtuta tachi ixlacatuna ju anuʼ maktiliʼ. Pus ju maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ aʼokxchokʼonu lapanac vaklhtam amacaʼancalh xalakʼajun junta maktajita jipi lacaʼazufre.
Chai ju aliʼin tapuni ju espada ju taxtui laʼixquilhni ju ixpujucʼalh ju xnapapa caballo. Pus tachi chun ju tsʼokʼo na talhilalh ju anuʼ acanit.
Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh pumatam anquilh ju minchalh lactʼiyan. Chai ixchʼapata ju xallave junta na makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Vachuʼ ixchʼapata ju makakʼai cadena.
Chai ju anuʼ anquilh chʼapalh ju kʼai lu ju na makʼanchich ixtʼajun. Yuchach ju lhacaticuru chai Satanás juncan. Chai chʼiʼula tam milh cʼata.

Chai lana tin macaʼalh junta makat lhokʼonkʼoʼanta. Chai malakachinu. Chai lana mucʼalh ju ixpamichin ju kʼai ucxtin laxamalhtich junta malakachinu. Ju chunch ni jantuch lai xamatiʼ camaklhtekʼaniyaʼ ni lai cataxtulh ni caʼaʼokxchokʼochokolh ju lapanacni tus ni calaktsayanta tam milh cʼata. Acsni calaktsayach pus tasqʼuini ni camacajuncalh pantsʼiquis.

Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh ju lackʼai putolan chai ixtapuvilanalh ju lapanacni ju axtaknicalh ixtachaputʼan ni laich catalakʼoxiyaʼ ju tuʼuʼ lhamakʼan. Chai iclaktsʼilh ixtacuvinʼan ju ixʼalacʼacchʼucʼupʼuxcanta va ixlacaʼatalh ni ixtanajun ni ixtalhilaksi ju Jesús chai ni ixtaʼajuni ju lapanacni ixchivinti Dios. Chai ju yuʼunch jantu ixtalakʼayata ju anuʼ maktiliʼ nin yuchi ju ixlapalaxtucanta ixlacatuna ju maktiliʼ nin yuchi ni caʼamuntiʼulacalh ixtapakaʼut ju maktiliʼ nin caʼulanicalh laʼixmacaʼan. Pus ju yuʼunch talokʼonchokolh laʼixʼanintiʼan chai tatʼataʼucxtini ju Cristo tam milh cʼata.
Yuʼunch ju pʼulhnan amalokʼonichokocalh laʼixʼanintiʼan. Para ju aliʼin aninin catalokʼonchokoyaʼ laʼixʼanintiʼan acsni caʼaclayaʼ tam milh cʼata.

Slivasalh na talackʼachan chai salaka tajunita ju makyuʼunch tajunita ju pʼulan amalokʼonichokocalh laʼixʼanintiʼan. Ju yuʼunch jantu catitani ju ixlhipaktʼui. Alai yuʼunch palijni catajunaʼ ju catalakʼayayaʼ ju Dios chai ju Cristo. Chai catatʼataʼucxtiniyach ju Cristo tam milh cʼata.
Chai acsni aclalhch ju tam milh cʼata pus ju Satanás maxtucalh laʼixpulachʼin.

Chai taxtulh. Alh aʼokxchokʼonuʼ ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ. Aʼokxchokʼomakʼaixtoklh ju Gog chai ju Magog ni catalasalh. Pus ju yuʼunch lana na ilhuʼan ixtajunita. Chunch ilhilhuʼan ixtajunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ xacucu alama.

Chai laʼixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ tatakʼaixtoklh. Chai talakʼaxcʼavitnu talakachoko ju ixlapanacni Dios junta ixtatʼajun ju lakʼachakʼan ju na mapaini ju Dios. Para ju Dios macamilh ju jipi chai lana alacmaknikʼo ju anuʼ talakʼaxcʼavitnunun.

Chai ju lhacaticuru ju ixʼaʼokxchokʼota ju yuʼunch lana tin macaʼancalh junta na kʼai maktajita lacaʼazufre. Anch junta ixtatanumanalh ju anuʼ maktiliʼ chai ju anuʼ lapanac ju ixlhitalacasuich tachi ixlapanac Dios. Pus caʼamamakʼalhkʼajnikʼalhicanaʼ tontatsʼis chai tontacuj.
Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lakatam kʼai putolan ju na xnapapa ixjunita. Vachuʼ iclaktsʼilh ju ixvi ju anch. Chai ju acsnich vachuʼ iclaktsʼilh ju lacatʼun chai ju lactʼiyan ni lana tatsʼankʼakʼo.

Chai iclaktsʼilh ju tanita ni ixtayanalh laʼixʼucxlacapuʼ ju anuʼ kʼai putolan mas yuʼunch ju xalackʼajin chai ju salactʼicstʼin. Chai ju lackʼalhtankʼai alhiqui apuxkʼotcalh. Chai vachuʼ puxkʼotcalh alakatam alhiqui. Yuchach ju alhiqui junta atsʼokʼulanicanta ixtapakaʼutʼan tachi chun ju alin isʼatsucuntiʼan jonkʼalhita. Chai tachi chun ju ixtanita amucʼanicalh ixtalakʼalhinʼan ixlacata ju taxtokni ju tsʼokcanta lacaʼalhiqui ni anchach istsʼokʼulakʼocanta tuchi tanavita ju kʼantam kʼantam.

Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju ixtanitajumanalh lacaʼalama talokʼonchokolh. Chai vachuʼ tachi chun ju aliʼin ju ixtanita. Chai ixchuxʼan amucʼanicalh ju ixtalakʼalhinʼan ixlacata tuchi navitach ju pumatamin. Chai tachi chun ju ani amacaʼancalh ju lacajipi.
Chai ju acsni jantu tavanan catini xamatiʼ. Para junta catamakʼalhkʼajnankʼalhiyaʼ yuchach ju ixlhipaktʼui aninti juncan.
Chai vachuʼ amacaʼancalh lacajipi tachi chun ju jantu alhitajunicalh ixtapakaʼutʼan lacaʼalhiqui junta tsʼokʼulanicanta ixtapakaʼutʼan ju alin isʼatsucuntiʼan jonkʼalhita.
Pus ju acsnich iclaktsʼilh lakatam sastʼi tʼiyan chai lakatam sastʼi lacatʼun. Pus ju pʼulhnan tʼiyan chai ju pʼulhnan lacatʼun tatsʼankʼakʼolh chai matich ixjunita ju alama.

Pus ju quitʼin icXivan chai quitʼin ju iclaktsʼilh ju ixlakʼachakʼan Dios ni minchalh lactʼiyan. Dios ju macamilh. Chai yuchach ju sastʼi Jerusalén junita. Slivasalh na cʼus istasui. Chun tachi ju tam atsiʼ ju na cʼus malakchʼinin ixlacata ixlhitʼataviti.

Chai ickʼasmatlh lakatam chivinti ju taxtucha ju lactʼiyan. Na pʼas ju chivinilh ni laich cakʼasmatkʼocalh. Chai chani naulh: ―Ju chavai ju Dios catsucuyaʼ junta tatʼajun ju lapanacni. Ju Dios anch ju camaktsucuyaʼ. Chai ju yuʼunch ixlapanacni catajunaʼ. Chai isʼakstu ju Dios caʼalactʼatolhkʼalhiyach chai isDiosʼan cajunaʼ.

Chai matich cajunaʼ ju kʼalhut. Chai jantu xamatiʼ caniyaʼ. Chai jantu xamatiʼ caʼamakʼanininaʼ nin yuchi ni lai cakʼalhulh nin yuchi ni lai jintaʼ caxcanilh. Jantu catiʼalilh tuʼuʼ ju chunch ni tapasakʼota ju xapʼulhnan taxtokni.

Chai ju yuchi ju ixvi laʼixputolan ju xakʼai ucxtin chani naulh: ―Quitʼin ju iclasastʼikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Vachuʼ chani ju quijunilh: ―Atsʼokʼulatʼich tachi chun ju ani taxtokni ni lai lhilaksican ju ani chivinti chai stavasalanti junita.

Chai vachuʼ chani ju quijunilh: ―Icnavikʼolhch tachi chun ju taxtokni. Ju quitʼin xactʼajun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai actsucukʼalhiyaʼ tus mas va tavananch. Pus ni xamatiʼ na quicxixa pus acxtakniyaʼ ju xcan ju va aclhikʼailaktsʼinaʼ. Anchach acʼiyaʼ junta taxtui ju xcan ju xtʼakʼa ju atsucunti jonkʼalhita. Laich cakʼotʼaʼ chai jantu catimapalalh tuʼuʼ.
Chai ju casastʼucʼaʼ ju macxcai sich ixʼanuʼ cajunaʼ tachi chun ju taxtokni. Chai ju quitʼin isDios acjunaʼ. Chai ju yuchi quintsʼalh cajunaʼ.

Para tachi chun ju va tatalhanan chai ixlhiyuchi jantu tachʼakʼokʼakʼalhiputun ju Jesús chai yuʼunch ju jantu talhilaksita ju Jesús chai yuʼunch ju na alactuʼunun chai ju amakninin chai ju tatʼatʼajun va tichi chavaich chai ju alhicujnin chai ju va tamaklacaʼani ju tuʼuʼ santo chai tachi chun ju tanajun taʼaklhtamat chivinti sich camacaʼancanaʼ lacajipi junta na maktajita lacaʼazufre. Yuchach ju ixlhipaktʼui aninti. ―Ma chunchach ju quijuni ju Dios ni actsʼokʼula.

Pus ju acsnich quilakmilh pumatam sia yuʼunch ju ixpumatujunʼan anquilhnin ju ixtachʼapata ju lakatamin ixpumapʼunʼan ju isʼaktsamanta lakatamin makʼalhkʼajnat ju va yuchach cajunaʼ. Chai ju anuʼ anquilh chani quijuni: ―Asokʼoch chai acmasuniyan ju isʼasqʼuininti ju ixʼamachakaʼ cajunaʼ ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.

Pus ju Spiritu Santu quimapaxanilh ju quiʼalacʼavanti chai ju anuʼ anquilh quilhiʼalh junta vi ju kʼai talhpa junta na putankʼai ixjunita. Chai ju anch quimasunilh ju kʼai ixlakʼachakʼan Dios ju Jerusalén juncan. Ixtʼonachilh takʼalhtajuchiniʼ ju ani lacatʼun. Minchalh ju lactʼiyan junta vilhcha ju Dios.

Chai ju anch lakʼachakʼan kʼai xlapʼapʼa ixmaktaji ni vachuʼ anch ju ixtʼajun ju Dios. Ixmaktaji tachi ju tuʼuʼ kʼoxi chiux ju slivasalh laklhu ixtapalh. Chun tachi ju tuʼuʼ chiux ju jaspe juncan. Chai na stalankʼa ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ vaso.

Chai ixʼulacanta kʼex ju na putankʼai ixjunita. Chai ixʼalin lakacautʼui xamalhtich. Chai ju lacalakatamin malhtich ixtayanalh pumatamin anquilh. Chai ju lacalakatamin malhtich istsʼokʼulacanta ixtapakaʼutʼan ju ixpumacautʼuiʼan istsʼalan ju makʼaniya lapanac ju Israel ixjuncan.
Ju lhichʼatoʼanta ixʼalin lakatʼutu xamalhtich. Chai ju lhinorte ixʼalin lakatʼutu xamalhtich. Chai ju lhisur ixʼalin lakatʼutu xamalhtich. Chai ju lhitsʼastʼai ixʼalin vachuʼ lakatʼutu xamalhtich.

Chai ju xakʼex ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan lakacautʼiyun chiux ixlachʼapata ju ixlhiputankʼai junta putachʼanʼacnui. Chai ju lakatamin ju anuʼ chiux anch istsʼokʼulacanta ixtapakaʼutʼan ixpumacautʼuiʼan ju ixtamalakachan ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
Chai ju xaquintʼachivinin ixchʼapata lakatam palhcan ju si oro. Yuchi ju capulhcayaʼ ju lakʼachakʼan chai ju xamalhtich chai ju xakʼex.

Chai ju lakʼachakʼan va makʼastutʼatʼi ixjunita. Chai vaklhtam chun ixjunita ju ixlhilhman chai ixlhipokʼai. Pus ju anuʼ anquilh pulhcalh ju lakʼachakʼan ju anuʼ palhcan. Pus chaʼalh lakatʼui milh a lakatʼui cientos kilómetro. Ju ixlhilhman chai ju ixlhipokʼai chai ju ixlhiputankʼai vaklhtam chun ju alhcanti.
Chai vachuʼ lhcalh ju xakʼex. Chaʼalh sesenta y cuatro metro. Chunch ju putʼekʼelh ju anquilh tachi ju taʼaputʼekʼenin ju lapanacni.
Ju ixlhinavicanta ju kʼex si yuʼ ju chiux ju jaspe juncan. Chai ju lakʼachakʼan si oro ixjunita. Chai slapʼapʼa ixmaktaji ju lacascʼun tachi ju tuʼuʼ vaso.

Chai junta putachʼanʼacnui ju xakʼex ju lakʼachakʼan yuchi ju putachʼanʼacnui tijpachux ju chiux ju na laklhu ixtapalh tajunita. Ju pʼulhnan ulacalh yuchi ju jaspe. Chai ju ixʼokslai ju anch yuchi ju zafiro. Chai astan yuchi ju ágata ixlhiʼulacanta. Chai astan yuchi ju esmeralda.
Astan ju ónice. Astan ju cornalina. Astan ju crisólito. Astan ju berilo. Astan ju topacio. Astan ju crisoprasa. Astan ju jacinto. Chai ju ixlhilakacautʼui ju tavi laʼixʼucxni chux yuchi ju amatiste.

Chai ju lakacautʼui xamalhtich lakatamin perla ixjunita. Ju lakatamin malhtich lakatamin perla ixjunita. Chai ju xati ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan si oro ixjunita. Chai na slapʼapʼa ixmaktaji lacascʼun tachi ju tuʼuʼ vaso.
Chai jantu iclaktsʼilh tuʼuʼ pujitat ju anch ni vanta anchach ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan ixvi ju Dios ju lai navikʼojui tachi chun ju taxtokni. Vachuʼ vanta anchach ixvi ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.
Chai ju anuʼ lakʼachakʼan jantu ixmaktasqʼuini ni camapulhcu ju tuʼuʼ avilhchan nin malhquiyuʼ ni Dios ju maputuncunita ju anch. Chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego yuchi ju xamaclhcu.

Chai laʼixʼamatuncunit cataʼalhtananaʼ tachi chun ju amachakʼan kʼai lakʼachakʼanixni ju amakʼalhtaxtucanta. Chai tachi chun ju xalackʼajin ucxtinin ju ani lacamunutpaʼ catalhiminach ju anch ju ixmakʼalitʼan ni catapulakʼayayach ju Dios.
Chai ju xamalhtich jantu tavanan camalacchonicanaʼ ju tuncuj. Chai ju anch matiʼ cajunaʼ ju atatsʼisni.
Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ catalakʼayayach ju Dios.

Para jantu tavanan lai catitanu ju anch ju tuʼuʼ lhquiliqui nin xamatiʼ ju navi ju tuʼuʼ ju na tsʼisi ju Dios nin xamatiʼ ju najun taʼaklhtamat. Va yuʼunch ju lai tatanui anch ju atsʼokʼulacanta ixtapakaʼutʼan laʼixʼalhiqui ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Yuchi ju alhiqui junta najun tichi chavaich ju alin isʼatsucunti jonkʼalhita.

Pus ju acsnich quimasunilh ju kʼai xcan ju xtʼakʼa ju atsucunti jonkʼalhita. Chai ju anuʼ xcan na stalankʼa ixjunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ vaso. Chai anch ju ixtaxtui laʼixputolanʼan ju kʼai ucxtin Dios chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego.

Chai ju anuʼ xcan va sok ixchʼakʼokʼai ju xati ju anuch lakʼachakʼan. Chai ju quilhtumacatam ju anuʼ kʼai xcan lacya ju xaqʼuiu ju xtʼakʼa ju atsucunti jonkʼalhita. Chai ju aquilhtumacatutam xcan vana. Chai ju anuʼ qʼuiu pakcautʼui ixtʼakʼa ju xatocʼat ju tamin cʼata. Paktamin ju tamin malhquiyuʼ. Chai tachi chun ju lapanacni ju tatʼajun ixlhilacaputsʼun ju lacamunutpaʼ ixtalhitacʼuchʼui ju xaxkʼoi ju anuʼ qʼuiu.
Chai ju anch jantu catiʼalilh tuʼuʼ ju alactuʼunti. Jantu lai catiʼalilh tuʼuʼ ju chunch ni anch vi ju ixputolanʼan ju kʼai ucxtin Dios chai ju Askʼatʼa Borrego. Chai ju ixlapanacni catalakʼayayaʼ.
Chai catalaktsʼinaʼ ju ixʼucxpuʼ ju Dios. Chai ju ixtapakaʼut caʼalhimichicanaʼ ju ixlapanacni laʼismuntsanʼan.

Chai ju anch matich cajunaʼ ju atatsʼisni. Chai jantu catamaktasqʼuiniyaʼ ju tuʼuʼ maclhcu nin avilhchan ni yuchi ju kʼai ucxtin Dios ju amapulhcuni. Chai ju ixlapanacni Dios catatʼataʼucxtinikʼalhiyaʼ ju yuchi.

Chai ju anuʼ anquilh chani ju quijuni: ―Tachi chun ju ani chivinti lai lhilaksican chai stavasalanti junita. Pus ju makʼanchich ju Dios amapastʼacʼani ju ixlapanacni ju tuchi catanaulh. Chai ju chavai ju yuchi amalakachalh ju ixʼanquilh ni laich catacʼatsayaʼ ju ixlapanacni ju tuchi vasalh catapasayaʼ. Chai jantu makʼan cativa tus catapasayaʼ ju anuʼ taxtokni.
Chai jantu makʼan cativa tus acsni caminaʼ ju Jesús. Chai na kʼachan ju yuchi ju caquiclacaʼiyaʼ ju ixchivinti Dios ju tsʼokcanta ju ani. ―Chunch xaquijuni ju anquilh.

Pus ju quitʼin icXivan chai quitʼin ju ickʼasmatlh chai iclaktsʼilh tachi chun ju ani taxtokni. Chai acsni ickʼasmatlh chai iclaktsʼilh ju ani taxtokni pus lana ictaʼaktsokotalh laʼixchʼanchʼajaʼ ju anuʼ anquilh. Va xaclakʼayaputun ju yuchi ju xaquimasunikʼojui ju ani taxtokni.

Para ju yuchi chani quijuni: ―Jantu chun aqʼuiʼulhtʼu. Ju quitʼin va mintʼaxalapanac icjunita. Chai ixtʼachunchʼan icjunita tachi ju milhiʼalakʼavin ju tanajun ixchivinti Dios chai ju taquiclacaʼi tachi chun ju chivinti ju tsʼokcanta ju ani. Yuchach ju Dios ju alakʼayatʼi.
Chai quijumpa: ―Tun va atʼilaclamtʼi junima alhiqui junta tsʼokcanta ixchivinti Dios. Jantu chunch alatʼi ni vaninch chinta ju avilhchan acsni cataiʼulacanaʼ ju taxtokni ju tsʼokcanta ju anch.

Ju na alactuʼunun pus chach tailhiʼalh ixnavica ju alactuʼunti. Chai ju na lhquiliqui ju ixʼatalacpastʼacʼat chach tailhiʼalh ju chunch. Chai ju soknicʼa ju isʼatsucunti chach va tachi navi ju soknicʼa. Chai ju salaka ju isʼatsucunti chach jonkʼalhi chunch.
Chai ju Jesús chani quijuni: ―Vaninch chinta ju avilhchan acsni acminaʼ chai aclhiminaʼ ju ixtalhajaʼan tachi chun ju lapanacni. Acʼalhimapalach ju tuchi navitach ju kʼantam kʼantam.
Ju quitʼin xactʼajun tus acsni maticaʼ tuʼuʼ ixjunita chai actsucukʼalhiyach tus mas va tavananch. ―Chunch ju quijunilh ju Jesús.

Na takʼachan ju tachʼakʼatʼajun ju ixpumpuʼan ni va tachi snapapa catajunaʼ. Pus yuʼunch ju laich catapʼuxaʼ ju xatocʼat ju qʼuiu ju xtʼakʼa ju atsucunti jonkʼalhi. Chai lai cataputanuyaʼ ju xalacmalhtich ju lakʼachakʼan.

Para lacamacni tatʼajun ju va ixtʼachunch tajunita tachi ju tuʼuʼ atapacxat chai ju alhicujnin chai ju tatʼatʼajun va tichi chavaich chai ju amakninin chai ju tamaklacaʼani ju tuʼuʼ santo chai tachi chun ju takʼachani ixnajunca ju taʼaklhtamat chivinti.

Chai ju Jesús quijunchokopa: ―Ju quitʼin icJesús chai icmalakachanichin ju quiʼanquilh ju caxtakniyan ju ani chivinti ixlacataʼan ju yuʼunch ju quintalhilaksi. Ju quitʼin ixtamaskʼatʼanti makʼaniya kʼai ucxtin David icjunita. Vachuʼ tachi ju kʼai stʼacu icjunita. Yuchi ju vatsʼisin xajachilh. ―Chunch ju xaquijuni ju Jesús.

Pus ju Spiritu Santu chai ju tachi isʼasqʼuininti Jesús junita tanajun: ―Asokʼoch. Chai ju kʼasmatʼa ju anuʼ chivinti chach vachuʼ chunch cajunilh ju aliʼin. Chai ju na quicxixta chach milh. Chai ju kʼotputun ju xcan ju xtʼakʼa ju atsucunti jonkʼalhita pus chach kʼotlh. Chai ju Dios jantu tuʼuʼ achʼinin.

Pus ju quitʼin pʼas icʼajuni tachi chun ju takʼasmatʼa ju ixchivinti Dios ju tsʼokcanta ju ani. Chai slivasalh ju icʼajuni. Ni xamatiʼ calalhavayaʼ ju ani chivinti pus ju Dios calalhavaniyaʼ ju makʼalhkʼajnat ju tsʼokcanta ju ani lacaʼalhiqui.

Chai ni xamatiʼ caxacamakʼanaʼ ju tuʼuʼ ixchivinti Dios ju tsʼokcanta ju ani lacaʼalhiqui pus ju Dios caxacaxtuyaʼ junta istsʼokcanta ju ixpuʼalilh ju isʼatsucunti jonkʼalhi chai jantu lai catitanu ju laʼixlakʼachakʼan Dios.
Pus ju najun ni stavasalanti tachi chun ju ani chivinti yuchi ju chani najun: ―Jantuch makʼan cativa tus acminach. Chunch ju najun chai vachuʼ iclacasqʼuin ni vatsʼalhti camilh.
Ju quiʼucxtin Jesús caʼanaviniyaʼ lamapainin tachi chun ju lapanacni ju talhilaksi ju Dios. Slivasalh chunch.
